saheeh: Say, "Indeed, there will never protect me from Allah anyone [if I should disobey], nor will I find in other than Him a refuge.
yusufali: Say: "No one can deliver me from Allah (If I were to disobey Him), nor should I find refuge except in Him,

malay: "(Aku diberi kuasa) hanya menyampaikan (wahyu) dari Allah dan perintah-perintahNya (yang ditugaskan kepadaku menyampaikannya); dan sesiapa yang menderhaka kepada Allah dan ingkarkan bawaan RasulNya, maka sesungguhnya disediakan baginya neraka Jahannam; kekallah mereka di dalamnya selama-lamanya.".
saheeh: But [I have for you] only notification from Allah, and His messages." And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger - then indeed, for him is the fire of Hell; they will abide therein forever.
yusufali: "Unless I proclaim what I receive from Allah and His Messages: for any that disobey Allah and His Messenger,- for them is Hell: they shall dwell therein for ever."

malay: (Golongan yang kufur ingkar itu tetap memandang engkau lemah dan kurang penyokong wahai Muhammad), sehingga apabila mereka melihat (azab) yang dijanjikan kepada mereka, maka (pada saat itu) mereka akan mengetahui siapakah orangnya yang lemah penolong-penolongnya, dan sedikit jumlah bilangannya.
saheeh: [The disbelievers continue] until, when they see that which they are promised, then they will know who is weaker in helpers and less in number.
yusufali: At length, when they see (with their own eyes) that which they are promised,- then will they know who it is that is weakest in (his) helper and least important in point of numbers.

malay: (Kalau ditanya bilakah azab itu? Maka) katakanlah: "Aku tidak mengetahui sama ada (azab) yang dijanjikan kepada kamu itu sudah dekat, atau Tuhanku menentukan bagi kedatangannya satu tempoh yang lanjut.
saheeh: Say, "I do not know if what you are promised is near or if my Lord will grant for it a [long] period."
yusufali: Say: "I know not whether the (Punishment) which ye are promised is near, or whether my Lord will appoint for it a distant term.

malay: "Tuhanlah sahaja yang mengetahui segala yang ghaib, maka Ia tidak memberitahu perkara ghaib yang diketahuiNya itu kepada sesiapapun, -
saheeh: [He is] Knower of the unseen, and He does not disclose His [knowledge of the] unseen to anyone
yusufali: "He (alone) knows the Unseen, nor does He make any one acquainted with His Mysteries,-

malay: "Melainkan kepada mana-mana Rasul yang di redaiNya (untuk mengetahui sebahagian dari perkara ghaib yang berkaitan dengan tugasnya; apabila Tuhan hendak melakukan yang demikian) maka Ia mengadakan di hadapan dan di belakang Rasul itu malaikat-malaikat yang menjaga dan mengawasnya (sehingga perkara ghaib itu selamat sampai kepada yang berkenaan).
saheeh: Except whom He has approved of messengers, and indeed, He sends before each messenger and behind him observers
yusufali: "Except a messenger whom He has chosen: and then He makes a band of watchers march before him and behind him,

malay: "(Tuhan mengadakan malaikat-malaikat itu) supaya Ia mengetahui bahawa sesungguhnya - (dengan jagaan mereka) - Rasul-rasul itu telah menyampaikan perutusan-perutusan Tuhan mereka, (dengan sempurna); pada hal Ia memang mengetahui dengan meliputi segala keadaan yang ada pada mereka, serta Ia menghitung tiap-tiap sesuatu: satu persatu".
saheeh: That he may know that they have conveyed the messages of their Lord; and He has encompassed whatever is with them and has enumerated all things in number.
yusufali: "That He may know that they have (truly) brought and delivered the Messages of their Lord: and He surrounds (all the mysteries) that are with them, and takes account of every single thing."

malay: Wahai orang yang berselimut!.
saheeh: O you who wraps himself [in clothing],
yusufali: O thou folded in garments!

malay: Bangunlah sembahyang Tahajjud pada waktu malam, selain dari sedikit masa (yang tak dapat tidak untuk berehat),
saheeh: Arise [to pray] the night, except for a little -
yusufali: Stand (to prayer) by night, but not all night,-

malay: Iaitu separuh dari waktu malam, atau kurangkan sedikit dari separuh itu,
saheeh: Half of it - or subtract from it a little
yusufali: Half of it,- or a little less,

malay: Ataupun lebihkan (sedikit) daripadanya; dan bacalah Al-Quran dengan "Tartil".
saheeh: Or add to it, and recite the Qur'an with measured recitation.
yusufali: Or a little more; and recite the Qur'an in slow, measured rhythmic tones.

malay: (Sayugialah engkau dan pengikut-pengikutmu membiasakan diri masing-masing dengan ibadat yang berat kepada hawa nafsu, kerana) sesungguhnya Kami akan menurunkan kepadamu wahyu (Al-Quran yang mengandungi perintah-perintah) yang berat (kepada orang-orang yang tidak bersedia menyempurnakannya).
saheeh: Indeed, We will cast upon you a heavy word.
yusufali: Soon shall We send down to thee a weighty Message.

malay: Sebenarnya sembahyang dan ibadat malam lebih kuat kesannya (kepada jiwa), dan lebih tetap betul bacaannya.
saheeh: Indeed, the hours of the night are more effective for concurrence [of heart and tongue] and more suitable for words.
yusufali: Truly the rising by night is most potent for governing (the soul), and most suitable for (framing) the Word (of Prayer and Praise).

malay: (Kami galakkan engkau dan umatmu beribadat pada waktu malam), kerana sesungguhnya engkau pada siang hari mempunyai urusan-urusan yang panjang kira bicaranya;
saheeh: Indeed, for you by day is prolonged occupation.
yusufali: True, there is for thee by day prolonged occupation with ordinary duties:

malay: Dan sebutlah (dengan lidah dan hati) akan nama Tuhanmu (terus menerus siang dan malam), serta tumpukanlah (amal ibadatmu) kepadaNya dengan sebulat-bulat tumpuan.
saheeh: And remember the name of your Lord and devote yourself to Him with [complete] devotion.
yusufali: But keep in remembrance the name of thy Lord and devote thyself to Him whole-heartedly.

malay: Dia lah Tuhan yang menguasai timur dan barat; tiada Tuhan melainkan Dia; maka jadikanlah Dia Penjaga yang menyempurnakan urusanmu.
saheeh: [He is] the Lord of the East and the West; there is no deity except Him, so take Him as Disposer of [your] affairs.
yusufali: (He is) Lord of the East and the West: there is no god but He: take Him therefore for (thy) Disposer of Affairs.

malay: Dan bersabarlah terhadap apa yang dikatakan oleh mereka (yang menentangmu), dan jauhkanlah dirimu dari mereka dengan cara yang baik.
saheeh: And be patient over what they say and avoid them with gracious avoidance.
yusufali: And have patience with what they say, and leave them with noble (dignity).

malay: Dan biarkanlah Aku sahaja membalas orang-orang yang mendustakan (bawaanmu) itu, orang-orang yang berada dalam kemewahan, dan berilah tempoh kepada mereka sedikit masa;
saheeh: And leave Me with [the matter of] the deniers, those of ease [in life], and allow them respite a little.
yusufali: And leave Me (alone to deal with) those in possession of the good things of life, who (yet) deny the Truth; and bear with them for a little while.

malay: Kerana sesungguhnya di sisi Kami disediakan (untuk mereka) belenggu-belenggu dan neraka yang menjulang-julang,
saheeh: Indeed, with Us [for them] are shackles and burning fire
yusufali: With Us are Fetters (to bind them), and a Fire (to burn them),

malay: Serta makanan yang menjadikan pemakannya tercekik, dan azab seksa yang tidak terperi sakitnya.
saheeh: And food that chokes and a painful punishment -
yusufali: And a Food that chokes, and a Penalty Grievous.

malay: (Azab itu tetap berlaku) pada hari bumi dan gunung-ganang bergoncang (serta hancur lebur), dan menjadilah gunung-ganang itu timbunan pasir yang mudah bersepah.
saheeh: On the Day the earth and the mountains will convulse and the mountains will become a heap of sand pouring down.
yusufali: One Day the earth and the mountains will be in violent commotion. And the mountains will be as a heap of sand poured out and flowing down.

malay: Sesungguhnya Kami telah mengutus kepada kamu (wahai umat Muhammad), seorang Rasul yang menjadi saksi terhadap kamu (tentang orang yang mematuhi atau menolak seruannya), sebagaimana Kami telah mengutus kepada Firaun seorang Rasul.
saheeh: Indeed, We have sent to you a Messenger as a witness upon you just as We sent to Pharaoh a messenger.
yusufali: We have sent to you, (O men!) a messenger, to be a witness concerning you, even as We sent a messenger to Pharaoh.

malay: Maka Firaun menderhaka kepada Rasul itu, lalu Kami menyeksakannya dengan azab seksa yang seberat-beratnya.
saheeh: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a ruinous seizure.
yusufali: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger; so We seized him with a heavy Punishment.

malay: (Sekiranya kamu tidak ditimpa azab di dunia), maka bagaimana kamu dapat menjaga dan menyelamatkan diri kamu - kalau kamu kufur ingkar - (dari azab) hari yang huru-haranya menyebabkan kanak-kanak menjadi tua beruban?
saheeh: Then how can you fear, if you disbelieve, a Day that will make the children white- haired?
yusufali: Then how shall ye, if ye deny (Allah), guard yourselves against a Day that will make children hoary-headed?-

malay: Langit (yang demikian besarnya) akan pecah belah dengan sebab kedahsyatan hari itu. (Ingatlah), janji Allah adalah perkara yang tetap dilakukanNya.
saheeh: The heaven will break apart therefrom; ever is His promise fulfilled.
yusufali: Whereon the sky will be cleft asunder? His Promise needs must be accomplished.

malay: Sesungguhnya (keterangan-keterangan yang mengandungi amaran) ini menjadi peringatan oleh itu sesiapa yang mahukan kebaikan dirinya dapatlah ia mengambil jalan yang membawa kepada Tuhannya (dengan iman dan taat).
saheeh: Indeed, this is a reminder, so whoever wills may take to his Lord a way.
yusufali: Verily this is an Admonition: therefore, whoso will, let him take a (straight) path to his Lord!

malay: Sesungguhnya Tuhanmu (wahai Muhammad) mengetahui bahawasanya engkau bangun (sembahyang Tahajjud) selama kurang dari dua pertiga malam, dan selama satu perduanya, dan selama satu pertiganya; dan (demikian juga dilakukan oleh) segolongan dari orang-orang yang bersama-samamu (kerana hendak menepati perintah yang terdahulu); padahal Allah jualah yang menentukan dengan tepat kadar masa malam dan siang. Ia mengetahui bahawa kamu tidak sekali-kali akan dapat mengira dengan tepat kadar masa itu, lalu Ia menarik balik perintahNya yang terdahulu (dengan memberi kemudahan) kepada kamu; oleh itu bacalah mana-mana yang mudah kamu dapat membacanya dari Al-Quran (dalam sembahyang). Ia juga mengetahui bahawa akan ada di antara kamu orang-orang yang sakit; dan yang lainnya orang-orang yang musafir di muka bumi untuk mencari rezeki dari limpah kurnia Allah; dan yang lainnya lagi orang-orang yang berjuang pada jalan Allah (membela agamaNya). Maka bacalah mana-mana yang sudah kamu dapat membacanya dari Al-Quran; dan dirikanlah sembahyang serta berikanlah zakat; dan berilah pinjaman kepada Allah sebagai pinjaman yang baik (ikhlas). Dan (ingatlah), apa jua kebaikan yang kamu kerjakan sebagai bekalan untuk diri kamu, tentulah kamu akan mendapat balasannya pada sisi Allah, -sebagai balasan yang sebaik-baiknya dan yang amat besar pahalanya. Dan mintalah ampun kepada Allah; sesungguhnya Allah Maha Pengampun, lagi Maha Mengasihani.
saheeh: Indeed, your Lord knows, [O Muhammad], that you stand [in prayer] almost two thirds of the night or half of it or a third of it, and [so do] a group of those with you. And Allah determines [the extent of] the night and the day. He has known that you [Muslims] will not be able to do it and has turned to you in forgiveness, so recite what is easy [for you] of the Qur'an. He has known that there will be among you those who are ill and others traveling throughout the land seeking [something] of the bounty of Allah and others fighting for the cause of Allah. So recite what is easy from it and establish prayer and give zakah and loan Allah a goodly loan. And whatever good you put forward for yourselves - you will find it with Allah. It is better and greater in reward. And seek forgiveness of Allah. Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
yusufali: Thy Lord doth know that thou standest forth (to prayer) nigh two-thirds of the night, or half the night, or a third of the night, and so doth a party of those with thee. But Allah doth appoint night and day in due measure He knoweth that ye are unable to keep count thereof. So He hath turned to you (in mercy): read ye, therefore, of the Qur'an as much as may be easy for you. He knoweth that there may be (some) among you in ill-health; others travelling through the land, seeking of Allah's bounty; yet others fighting in Allah's Cause, read ye, therefore, as much of the Qur'an as may be easy (for you); and establish regular Prayer and give regular Charity; and loan to Allah a Beautiful Loan. And whatever good ye send forth for your souls ye shall find it in Allah's Presence,- yea, better and greater, in Reward and seek ye the Grace of Allah: for Allah is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

malay: Wahai orang yang berselimut!
saheeh: O you who covers himself [with a garment],
yusufali: O thou wrapped up (in the mantle)!

malay: Bangunlah serta berilah peringatan dan amaran (kepada umat manusia).
saheeh: Arise and warn
yusufali: Arise and deliver thy warning!

malay: Dan Tuhanmu, maka ucaplah dan ingatlah kebesaranNya!
saheeh: And your Lord glorify
yusufali: And thy Lord do thou magnify!

malay: Dan pakaianmu, maka hendaklah engkau bersihkan.
saheeh: And your clothing purify
yusufali: And thy garments keep free from stain!

malay: Dan segala kejahatan, maka hendaklah engkau jauhi.
saheeh: And uncleanliness avoid
yusufali: And all abomination shun!

malay: Dan janganlah engkau memberi (sesuatu, dengan tujuan hendak) mendapat lebih banyak daripadanya.
saheeh: And do not confer favor to acquire more
yusufali: Nor expect, in giving, any increase (for thyself)!

malay: Dan bagi (menjalankan perintah) Tuhanmu, maka hendaklah engkau bersabar (terhadap tentangan musuh)!
saheeh: But for your Lord be patient.
yusufali: But, for thy Lord's (Cause), be patient and constant!

malay: Kerana apabila telah ditiup sangkakala,
saheeh: And when the trumpet is blown,
yusufali: Finally, when the Trumpet is sounded,

malay: Maka saat yang demikian adalah saat (berlakunya) hari yang sukar -
saheeh: That Day will be a difficult day
yusufali: That will be- that Day - a Day of Distress,-

malay: Kepada orang-orang kafir, lagi tidak mudah (mengelak azabnya).
saheeh: For the disbelievers - not easy.
yusufali: Far from easy for those without Faith.

malay: (Jangan engkau bimbang wahai Muhammad) biarkanlah Aku sahaja membalas orang (yang menentangmu) yang Aku ciptakan dia (dalam keadaan) seorang diri (tidak berharta dan anak pinak),
saheeh: Leave Me with the one I created alone
yusufali: Leave Me alone, (to deal) with the (creature) whom I created (bare and) alone!-

malay: Dan Aku jadikan baginya harta kekayaan yang banyak,
saheeh: And to whom I granted extensive wealth
yusufali: To whom I granted resources in abundance,

malay: Serta anak pinak (yang ramai), yang sentiasa ada di sisinya.
saheeh: And children present [with him]
yusufali: And sons to be by his side!-

malay: Dan Aku mudahkan baginya (mendapat kekayaan dan kekuasaan) dengan semudah-mudahnya.
saheeh: And spread [everything] before him, easing [his life].
yusufali: To whom I made (life) smooth and comfortable!

malay: Kemudian ia ingin sangat, supaya Aku tambahi lagi;
saheeh: Then he desires that I should add more.
yusufali: Yet is he greedy-that I should add (yet more);-

malay: Tidak sekali-kali (akan ditambahi) ! Kerana sesungguhnya dia menentang dengan degilnya akan ayat-ayat Kami (Al-Quran, yang disampaikan oleh Rasul Kami).
saheeh: No! Indeed, he has been toward Our verses obstinate.
yusufali: By no means! For to Our Signs he has been refractory!

malay: Aku akan menyeksanya (dengan azab) yang memuncak beratnya.
saheeh: I will cover him with arduous torment.
yusufali: Soon will I visit him with a mount of calamities!

malay: Kerana sesungguhnya ia telah memikirkan dan mereka-reka berbagai tuduhan terhadap Al-Quran) -
saheeh: Indeed, he thought and deliberated.
yusufali: For he thought and he plotted;-

malay: Maka binasalah dia hendaknya! Bagaimanakah dia berani mereka-reka (yang demikian)?
saheeh: So may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.
yusufali: And woe to him! How he plotted!-

malay: Sekali lagi: binasalah dia hendaknya! Bagaimana ia berani mereka-reka (tuduhan-tuduhan itu)?
saheeh: Then may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.
yusufali: Yea, Woe to him; How he plotted!-

malay: Kemudian ia merenung dan memikirkan (berkali-kali: jalan-jalan mencaci Al-Quran, tetapi ia gagal);
saheeh: Then he considered [again];
yusufali: Then he looked round;

malay: Setelah itu ia memasamkan mukanya serta ia bertambah masam berkerut;
saheeh: Then he frowned and scowled;
yusufali: Then he frowned and he scowled;

malay: Kemudian ia berpaling (dari kebenaran) dan berlaku sombong angkuh,
saheeh: Then he turned back and was arrogant
yusufali: Then he turned back and was haughty;

malay: Serta ia berkata: " (Al-Quran) ini tidak lain hanyalah sihir yang dituntut serta dipelajari (dari ahli-ahlinya);
saheeh: And said, "This is not but magic imitated [from others].
yusufali: Then said he: "This is nothing but magic, derived from of old;

malay: "Ini tidak lain hanyalah kata-kata (rekaan) manusia!"
saheeh: This is not but the word of a human being."
yusufali: "This is nothing but the word of a mortal!"

malay: (Disebabkan kekufurannya itu) Aku akan masukkan dia ke dalam neraka Saqar.
saheeh: I will drive him into Saqar.
yusufali: Soon will I cast him into Hell-Fire!

malay: Dan apa jalannya engkau dapat mengetahui kedahsyatan neraka Saqar itu?
saheeh: And what can make you know what is Saqar?
yusufali: And what will explain to thee what Hell-Fire is?

malay: Ia membakar mangsanya dengan tidak meninggalkan sisa, dan tidak membiarkannya (binasa terus)
saheeh: It lets nothing remain and leaves nothing [unburned],
yusufali: Naught doth it permit to endure, and naught doth it leave alone!-

malay: Ia terus-menerus membakar kulit manusia!
saheeh: Blackening the skins.
yusufali: Darkening and changing the colour of man!

malay: Pengawal dan penjaganya adalah sembilan belas (malaikat).
saheeh: Over it are nineteen [angels].
yusufali: Over it are Nineteen.

malay: Dan (ketahuilah bahawa hikmat) Kami tidak menjadikan pengawal-pengawal neraka itu melainkan (dari kalangan) malaikat, (kerana merekalah sekuat-kuat dan sebenar-benar makhluk yang menjalankan perintah Kami); dan (hikmat) Kami tidak menerangkan bilangan mereka melainkan dengan satu bilangan yang menyebabkan kesesatan dan kesengsaraan orang-orang kafir itu, supaya orang-orang yang diberi Kitab (Yahudi dan Nasrani) boleh percaya dengan yakin (akan kebenaran Al-Quran), dan supaya orang-orang yang beriman bertambah imannya; dan juga supaya orang-orang yang diberi Kitab dan orang-orang yang beriman itu tidak ragu-ragu (tentang kebenaran keterangan itu); dan (sebaliknya) supaya orang-orang (munafik) yang ada penyakit (ragu-ragu) dalam hatinya dan orang-orang kafir berkata: "Apakah yang di maksudkan oleh Allah dengan menyebutkan bilangan ganjil ini?" Demikianlah Allah menyesatkan sesiapa yang dikehendakiNya (menurut undang-undang peraturanNya), dan memberi hidayah petunjuk kepada sesiapa yang dikehendakiNya (menurut undang-undang peraturanNya); dan tiada yang mengetahui tentera Tuhanmu melainkan Dia lah sahaja. Dan (ingatlah, segala yang diterangkan berkenaan dengan) neraka itu tidak lain hanyalah menjadi peringatan bagi manusia.
saheeh: And We have not made the keepers of the Fire except angels. And We have not made their number except as a trial for those who disbelieve - that those who were given the Scripture will be convinced and those who have believed will increase in faith and those who were given the Scripture and the believers will not doubt and that those in whose hearts is hypocrisy and the disbelievers will say, "What does Allah intend by this as an example?" Thus does Allah leave astray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And none knows the soldiers of your Lord except Him. And mention of the Fire is not but a reminder to humanity.
yusufali: And We have set none but angels as Guardians of the Fire; and We have fixed their number only as a trial for Unbelievers,- in order that the People of the Book may arrive at certainty, and the Believers may increase in Faith,- and that no doubts may be left for the People of the Book and the Believers, and that those in whose hearts is a disease and the Unbelievers may say, "What symbol doth Allah intend by this?" Thus doth Allah leave to stray whom He pleaseth, and guide whom He pleaseth: and none can know the forces of thy Lord, except He and this is no other than a warning to mankind.

malay: Sebenarnya! Demi bulan,
saheeh: No! By the moon
yusufali: Nay, verily: By the Moon,

malay: Dan malam apabila ia balik melenyapkan diri,
saheeh: And [by] the night when it departs
yusufali: And by the Night as it retreateth,

malay: Dan waktu subuh apabila ia terang-benderang,
saheeh: And [by] the morning when it brightens,
yusufali: And by the Dawn as it shineth forth,-

malay: Sesungguhnya neraka Saqar itu adalah salah satu (malapetaka) yang amat besar,
saheeh: Indeed, the Fire is of the greatest [afflictions]
yusufali: This is but one of the mighty (portents),

malay: Yang menjadi amaran bagi umat manusia,
saheeh: As a warning to humanity -
yusufali: A warning to mankind,-

malay: (Iaitu) bagi sesiapa di antara kamu yang mahu maju (dalam mengerjakan kebaikan) atau yang mahu mundur (daripada mengerjakannya).
saheeh: To whoever wills among you to proceed or stay behind.
yusufali: To any of you that chooses to press forward, or to follow behind;-

malay: Tiap-tiap diri terikat, tidak terlepas daripada (balasan buruk bagi amal jahat) yang dikerjakannya,
saheeh: Every soul, for what it has earned, will be retained
yusufali: Every soul will be (held) in pledge for its deeds.

malay: Kecuali puak Kanan,
saheeh: Except the companions of the right,
yusufali: Except the Companions of the Right Hand.

malay: (Mereka ditempatkan) di dalam Syurga (yang penuh nikmat), mereka bertanya-tanya,
saheeh: [Who will be] in gardens, questioning each other
yusufali: (They will be) in Gardens (of Delight): they will question each other,

malay: Tentang (tempat tinggal) orang-orang yang bersalah,
saheeh: About the criminals,
yusufali: And (ask) of the Sinners:

malay: (Setelah melihat orang-orang yang bersalah itu, mereka berkata): "Apakah yang menyebabkan kamu masuk ke dalam (neraka) Saqar?"
saheeh: [And asking them], "What put you into Saqar?"
yusufali: "What led you into Hell Fire?"

malay: Orang-orang yang bersalah itu menjawab: "Kami tidak termasuk dalam kumpulan orang-orang yang mengerjakan sembahyang;
saheeh: They will say, "We were not of those who prayed,
yusufali: They will say: "We were not of those who prayed;

malay: "Dan kami tidak pernah memberi makan orang-orang miskin;
saheeh: Nor did we used to feed the poor.
yusufali: "Nor were we of those who fed the indigent;

malay: "Dan kami dahulu selalu mengambil bahagian memperkatakan perkara yang salah, bersama-sama orang-orang yang memperkatakannya;
saheeh: And we used to enter into vain discourse with those who engaged [in it],
yusufali: "But we used to talk vanities with vain talkers;

malay: "Dan kami sentiasa mendustakan hari pembalasan,
saheeh: And we used to deny the Day of Recompense
yusufali: "And we used to deny the Day of Judgment,

malay: "Sehinggalah kami didatangi oleh perkara yang tetap diyakini".
saheeh: Until there came to us the certainty."
yusufali: "Until there came to us (the Hour) that is certain."

malay: Maka tidak akan berguna kepada mereka sebarang syafaat pertolongan (kalaulah ditakdirkan ada) sesiapa yang boleh memberikan syafaat itu.
saheeh: So there will not benefit them the intercession of [any] intercessors.
yusufali: Then will no intercession of (any) intercessors profit them.

malay: (Kalau demikianlah halnya orang-orang yang bersalah), maka mengapa mereka berpaling lari dari peringatan (Al-Quran) ?
saheeh: Then what is [the matter] with them that they are, from the reminder, turning away
yusufali: Then what is the matter with them that they turn away from admonition?-

malay: Seolah-olah mereka sekawan keldai liar yang lari,
saheeh: As if they were alarmed donkeys
yusufali: As if they were affrighted asses,

malay: Melarikan diri (ketakutan) dari singa!
saheeh: Fleeing from a lion?
yusufali: Fleeing from a lion!

malay: (Mereka tidak merasa cukup dengan peringatan itu) bahkan tiap-tiap seorang di antaranya mahu supaya diberi kepadanya lembaran surat yang terbuka (yang diturunkan dari langit untuk dibaca oleh mereka sendiri).
saheeh: Rather, every person among them desires that he would be given scriptures spread about.
yusufali: Forsooth, each one of them wants to be given scrolls (of revelation) spread out!

malay: Sebenarnya! (Bukan kerana kemahuan mereka tidak berhasil), bahkan mereka (tidak percaya dan) tidak takut akan hari akhirat.
saheeh: No! But they do not fear the Hereafter.
yusufali: By no means! But they fear not the Hereafter,

malay: Ketahuilah! Sesungguhnya Al-Quran itu adalah satu peringatan (yang sangat besar pengajarannya);
saheeh: No! Indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder
yusufali: Nay, this surely is an admonition:

malay: Oleh itu sesiapa yang mahu (beringat) dapatlah ia mengambil peringatan daripadanya.
saheeh: Then whoever wills will remember it.
yusufali: Let any who will, keep it in remembrance!

malay: Dan (dalam pada itu) tiadalah mereka dapat beringat melainkan jika dikehendaki Allah; Dia lah Tuhan yang berhak dipatuhi perintahNya, dan Dia lah jua yang berhak memberi keampunan (kepada orang-orang yang beriman dan taat).
saheeh: And they will not remember except that Allah wills. He is worthy of fear and adequate for [granting] forgiveness.
yusufali: But none will keep it in remembrance except as Allah wills: He is the Lord of Righteousness, and the Lord of Forgiveness.

malay: Aku bersumpah dengan Hari Kiamat;
saheeh: I swear by the Day of Resurrection
yusufali: I do call to witness the Resurrection Day;

malay: Dan Aku bersumpah dengan "Nafsul Lawwaamah" (Bahawa kamu akan dibangkitkan sesudah mati)!
saheeh: And I swear by the reproaching soul [to the certainty of resurrection].
yusufali: And I do call to witness the self-reproaching spirit: (Eschew Evil).

malay: Patutkah manusia (yang kafir) menyangka bahawa Kami tidak akan dapat mengumpulkan tulang-tulangnya (dan menghidupkannya semula)?
saheeh: Does man think that We will not assemble his bones?
yusufali: Does man think that We cannot assemble his bones?

malay: Bukan sebagaimana yang disangka itu, bahkan Kami berkuasa menyusun (dengan sempurnanya segala tulang) jarinya, (tulang yang lebih halus dari yang lain).
saheeh: Yes. [We are] Able [even] to proportion his fingertips.
yusufali: Nay, We are able to put together in perfect order the very tips of his fingers.

malay: (Kebenaran itu bukan tidak ada buktinya), bahkan manusia (yang ingkar) sentiasa suka hendak meneruskan perbuatan kufur dan maksiat (di sepanjang hayatnya, sehingga ia tidak mengakui adanya hari kiamat).
saheeh: But man desires to continue in sin.
yusufali: But man wishes to do wrong (even) in the time in front of him.

malay: Dia bertanya (secara mengejek): "Bilakah datangnya hari kiamat itu?"
saheeh: He asks, "When is the Day of Resurrection?"
yusufali: He questions: "When is the Day of Resurrection?"

malay: Maka (jawabnya: hari kiamat akan datang) apabila pemandangan menjadi terpendar-pendar (kerana gerun takut),
saheeh: So when vision is dazzled
yusufali: At length, when the sight is dazed,

malay: Dan bulan hilang cahayanya,
saheeh: And the moon darkens
yusufali: And the moon is buried in darkness.

malay: Dan matahari serta bulan dihimpunkan bersama,
saheeh: And the sun and the moon are joined,
yusufali: And the sun and moon are joined together,-

malay: (Maka) pada hari itu, berkatalah manusia (yang ingkarkan hari kiamat): "Ke manakah hendak melarikan diri?"
saheeh: Man will say on that Day, "Where is the [place of] escape?"
yusufali: That Day will Man say: "Where is the refuge?"

malay: Tak usahlah bertanya demikian! Tidak ada lagi tempat perlindungan!
saheeh: No! There is no refuge.
yusufali: By no means! No place of safety!

malay: Pada hari itu, kepada Tuhanmu lah sahaja terserahnya ketetapan segala perkara.
saheeh: To your Lord, that Day, is the [place of] permanence.
yusufali: Before thy Lord (alone), that Day will be the place of rest.

malay: Pada hari itu, manusia diberitahu akan apa yang ia telah lakukan, dan apa yang ia telah tinggalkan.
saheeh: Man will be informed that Day of what he sent ahead and kept back.
yusufali: That Day will Man be told (all) that he put forward, and all that he put back.

malay: Bahkan manusia itu, (anggotanya) menjadi saksi terhadap dirinya sendiri,
saheeh: Rather, man, against himself, will be a witness,
yusufali: Nay, man will be evidence against himself,

malay: Walaupun ia memberikan alasan-alasannya (untuk membela diri).
saheeh: Even if he presents his excuses.
yusufali: Even though he were to put up his excuses.

malay: Janganlah engkau (wahai Muhammad) - Kerana hendakkan cepat menghafaz Quran yang diturunkan kepadamu - menggerakkan lidahmu membacanya (sebelum selesai dibacakan kepadamu).
saheeh: Move not your tongue with it, [O Muhammad], to hasten with recitation of the Qur'an.
yusufali: Move not thy tongue concerning the (Qur'an) to make haste therewith.

malay: Sesungguhnya Kamilah yang berkuasa mengumpulkan Al-Quran itu (dalam dadamu), dan menetapkan bacaannya (pada lidahmu);
saheeh: Indeed, upon Us is its collection [in your heart] and [to make possible] its recitation.
yusufali: It is for Us to collect it and to promulgate it:

malay: Oleh itu, apabila Kami telah menyempurnakan bacaannya (kepadamu, dengan perantaraan Jibril), maka bacalah menurut bacaannya itu;
saheeh: So when We have recited it [through Gabriel], then follow its recitation.
yusufali: But when We have promulgated it, follow thou its recital (as promulgated):

malay: Kemudian, sesungguhnya kepada Kamilah terserah urusan menjelaskan kandungannya (yang memerlukan penjelasan).
saheeh: Then upon Us is its clarification [to you].
yusufali: Nay more, it is for Us to explain it (and make it clear):

malay: Sedarlah wahai orang-orang yang lalai. (Sebenarnya kamu tidak ingatkan kesudahan kamu) bahkan kamu sentiasa mencintai (Kesenangan dan kemewahan dunia) yang cepat habisnya.
saheeh: No! But you love the immediate
yusufali: Nay, (ye men!) but ye love the fleeting life,

malay: Dan kamu tidak menghiraukan (bekalan untuk) hari akhirat (yang kekal abadi kehidupannya).
saheeh: And leave the Hereafter.
yusufali: And leave alone the Hereafter.

malay: Pada hari akhirat itu, muka (orang-orang yang beriman) berseri-seri;
saheeh: [Some] faces, that Day, will be radiant,
yusufali: Some faces, that Day, will beam (in brightness and beauty);-

malay: Melihat kepada Tuhannya.
saheeh: Looking at their Lord.
yusufali: Looking towards their Lord;

malay: Dan pada hari itu, muka (orang-orang kafir) muram hodoh,
saheeh: And [some] faces, that Day, will be contorted,
yusufali: And some faces, that Day, will be sad and dismal,

malay: Sambil percaya dengan yakin bahawa mereka akan ditimpa malapetaka (azab seksa) yang membinasakan.
saheeh: Expecting that there will be done to them [something] backbreaking.
yusufali: In the thought that some back-breaking calamity was about to be inflicted on them;

malay: Sedarlah (janganlah mengutamakan dunia dan melupakan akhirat. Ingatlah akan hal orang yang hendak mati) apabila rohnya sampai ke pangkal kerongkong,
saheeh: No! When the soul has reached the collar bones
yusufali: Yea, when (the soul) reaches to the collar-bone (in its exit),

malay: Dan (orang-orang yang hadir di sisinya heboh) berkata: "Siapakah yang dapat menawar jampi (dan mengubatnya)?"
saheeh: And it is said, "Who will cure [him]?"
yusufali: And there will be a cry, "Who is a magician (to restore him)?"

malay: Dan ia sendiri yakin, bahawa sesungguhnya saat itu saat perpisahan;
saheeh: And the dying one is certain that it is the [time of] separation
yusufali: And he will conclude that it was (the Time) of Parting;

malay: Serta kedahsyatan bertindih-tindih;
saheeh: And the leg is wound about the leg,
yusufali: And one leg will be joined with another:

malay: (Maka) kepada Tuhanmu lah - pada waktu itu - engkau dibawa (untuk menerima balasan).
saheeh: To your Lord, that Day, will be the procession.
yusufali: That Day the Drive will be (all) to thy Lord!

malay: (Oleh sebab orang yang kufur ingkar tidak percayakan hari akhirat) maka ia tidak mengakui kebenaran (yang diwajibkan meyakininya) dan ia tidak mengerjakan sembahyang (yang difardhukan mengerjakannya)!
saheeh: And the disbeliever had not believed, nor had he prayed.
yusufali: So he gave nothing in charity, nor did he pray!-

malay: Akan tetapi ia mendustakan, dan berpaling ingkar!
saheeh: But [instead], he denied and turned away.
yusufali: But on the contrary, he rejected Truth and turned away!

malay: Kemudian ia pergi kepada keluarganya dengan berlagak sombong megah.
saheeh: And then he went to his people, swaggering [in pride].
yusufali: Then did he stalk to his family in full conceit!

malay: (Wahai orang yang kufur ingkar!) sudahlah dekat kepadamu kebinasaanmu, sudahlah dekat!
saheeh: Woe to you, and woe!
yusufali: Woe to thee, (O men!), yea, woe!

malay: Kemudian api nerakalah lebih layak bagimu, lebih layak.
saheeh: Then woe to you, and woe!
yusufali: Again, Woe to thee, (O men!), yea, woe!

malay: Patutkah manusia menyangka, bahawa ia akan ditinggalkan terbiar (dengan tidak diberikan tanggungjawab dan tidak dihidupkan menerima balasan)?
saheeh: Does man think that he will be left neglected?
yusufali: Does man think that he will be left uncontrolled, (without purpose)?

malay: Bukankah ia berasal dari air mani yang dipancarkan (ke dalam rahim)?
saheeh: Had he not been a sperm from semen emitted?
yusufali: Was he not a drop of sperm emitted (in lowly form)?

malay: Kemudian air mani itu menjadi sebuku darah beku, sesudah itu Tuhan menciptakannya, dan menyempurnakan kejadiannya (sebagai manusia)?
saheeh: Then he was a clinging clot, and [Allah] created [his form] and proportioned [him]
yusufali: Then did he become a leech-like clot; then did (Allah) make and fashion (him) in due proportion.

malay: Lalu Tuhan menjadikan daripadanya dua jenis - lelaki dan perempuan.
saheeh: And made of him two mates, the male and the female.
yusufali: And of him He made two sexes, male and female.

malay: Adakah (Tuhan yang menjadikan semuanya) itu - tidak berkuasa menghidupkan orang-orang yang mati? (Tentulah berkuasa)!
saheeh: Is not that [Creator] Able to give life to the dead?
yusufali: Has not He, (the same), the power to give life to the dead?

malay: Bukankah telah berlalu kepada manusia satu ketika dari masa (yang beredar), sedang ia (masih belum wujud lagi, dan) tidak menjadi sesuatu benda yang disebut-sebut, (maka mengapa kaum musyrik itu mengingkari hari akhirat)?
saheeh: Has there [not] come upon man a period of time when he was not a thing [even] mentioned?
yusufali: Has there not been over Man a long period of Time, when he was nothing - (not even) mentioned?

malay: Sesungguhnya Kami telah aturkan cara mencipta manusia bermulanya dari air mani yang bercampur (dari pati benih lelaki dan perempuan), serta Kami tetap mengujinya (dengan kewajipan-kewajipan); oleh itu maka Kami jadikan dia berkeadaan mendengar dan melihat.
saheeh: Indeed, We created man from a sperm-drop mixture that We may try him; and We made him hearing and seeing.
yusufali: Verily We created Man from a drop of mingled sperm, in order to try him: So We gave him (the gifts), of Hearing and Sight.

malay: Kerana keadaan itu tidak mencukupi, maka) sesungguhnya Kami telah menunjukkan kepadanya (melalui akal dan Rasul) akan jalan-jalan (yang benar dan yang salah; maka terserahlah kepadanya) sama ada ia bersyukur (dengan beriman dan taat), ataupun ia berlaku kufur (dengan mengingkari kebenaran atau menderhaka).
saheeh: Indeed, We guided him to the way, be he grateful or be he ungrateful.
yusufali: We showed him the Way: whether he be grateful or ungrateful (rests on his will).

malay: (Dalam pada itu), sesungguhnya Kami telah menyediakan bagi sesiapa yang berlaku kufur (atau menderhaka): beberapa rantai dan belenggu serta neraka yang menjulang-julang.
saheeh: Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains and shackles and a blaze.
yusufali: For the Rejecters we have prepared chains, yokes, and a blazing Fire.

malay: Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang berbakti (dengan taat dan kebajikan), akan meminum dari piala: sejenis minuman yang bercampur dengan "Kafur", -
saheeh: Indeed, the righteous will drink from a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of Kafur,
yusufali: As to the Righteous, they shall drink of a Cup (of Wine) mixed with Kafur,-

malay: Iaitu sebuah matair (di Syurga), yang diminum daripadanya oleh hamba-hamba Allah (yang taat); mereka boleh mengalirkannya (di tempat-tempat tinggal mereka) dengan aliran yang semudah-mudahnya dan menurut kemahuannya.
saheeh: A spring of which the [righteous] servants of Allah will drink; they will make it gush forth in force [and abundance].
yusufali: A Fountain where the Devotees of Allah do drink, making it flow in unstinted abundance.

malay: (Mereka dikurniakan kesenangan itu kerana) mereka menyempurnakan nazarnya (apatah lagi yang diwajibkan Tuhan kepadanya), serta mereka takutkan hari (akhirat) yang azab seksanya merebak di sana sini.
saheeh: They [are those who] fulfill [their] vows and fear a Day whose evil will be widespread.
yusufali: They perform (their) vows, and they fear a Day whose evil flies far and wide.

malay: Mereka juga memberi makan benda-benda makanan yang dihajati dan disukainya, kepada orang miskin dan anak yatim serta orang tawanan,
saheeh: And they give food in spite of love for it to the needy, the orphan, and the captive,
yusufali: And they feed, for the love of Allah, the indigent, the orphan, and the captive,-

malay: (Sambil berkata dengan lidah atau dengan hati): "Sesungguhnya kami memberi makan kepada kamu kerana Allah semata-mata; kami tidak berkehendakkan sebarang balasan dari kamu atau ucapan terima kasih,
saheeh: [Saying], "We feed you only for the countenance of Allah. We wish not from you reward or gratitude.
yusufali: (Saying),"We feed you for the sake of Allah alone: no reward do we desire from you, nor thanks.

malay: "Kami sebenarnya takutkan Tuhan kami, takut Ia kenakan kami azab hari yang padanya muka orang-orang yang bersalah: masam berkerut-kerut".
saheeh: Indeed, We fear from our Lord a Day austere and distressful."
yusufali: "We only fear a Day of distressful Wrath from the side of our Lord."

malay: Dengan sebab (mereka menjaga diri dari kesalahan), maka Allah selamatkan mereka dari kesengsaraan hari yang demikian keadaannya, serta memberikan kepada mereka keindahan yang berseri-seri (di muka), dan perasaan ria gembira (di hati).
saheeh: So Allah will protect them from the evil of that Day and give them radiance and happiness
yusufali: But Allah will deliver them from the evil of that Day, and will shed over them a Light of Beauty and (blissful) Joy.

malay: Dan kerana kesabaran mereka (mengerjakan suruhan Allah dan meninggalkan laranganNya), mereka dibalas oleh Allah dengan Syurga dan (persalinan dari) sutera.
saheeh: And will reward them for what they patiently endured [with] a garden [in Paradise] and silk [garments].
yusufali: And because they were patient and constant, He will reward them with a Garden and (garments of) silk.

malay: Mereka berehat di dalam Syurga dengan berbaring di atas pelamin-pelamin (yang berhias), mereka tidak nampak di situ adanya matahari (usahkan hawa panasnya), dan tidak juga merasai suasana yang terlampau sejuk;
saheeh: [They will be] reclining therein on adorned couches. They will not see therein any [burning] sun or [freezing] cold.
yusufali: Reclining in the (Garden) on raised thrones, they will see there neither the sun's (excessive heat) nor (the moon's) excessive cold.

malay: Sedang naungan pohon-pohon Syurga itu dekat kepada mereka, dan buah-buahannya pula dimudahkan (untuk mereka memetiknya) dengan semudah-mudahnya.
saheeh: And near above them are its shades, and its [fruit] to be picked will be lowered in compliance.
yusufali: And the shades of the (Garden) will come low over them, and the bunches (of fruit), there, will hang low in humility.

malay: Dan (selain itu) diedarkan kepada mereka (oleh pelayan-pelayannya): bijana dari perak dan piala-piala minuman yang keadaannya laksana kaca (nampak jelas isinya) -
saheeh: And there will be circulated among them vessels of silver and cups having been [created] clear [as glass],
yusufali: And amongst them will be passed round vessels of silver and goblets of crystal,-

malay: (Keadaannya laksana) kaca, (sedang ia) dari perak; pelayan-pelayan itu menentukan kadar isinya sekadar yang cukup betul dengan kehendak penggunanya.
saheeh: Clear glasses [made] from silver of which they have determined the measure.
yusufali: Crystal-clear, made of silver: they will determine the measure thereof (according to their wishes).

malay: Dan mereka dalam Syurga itu, diberi minum sejenis minuman yang campurannya dari "Zanjabil",
saheeh: And they will be given to drink a cup [of wine] whose mixture is of ginger
yusufali: And they will be given to drink there of a Cup (of Wine) mixed with Zanjabil,-

malay: Iaitu sebuah matair dalam Syurga, yang disebutkan sifatnya sebagai "Salsabil".
saheeh: [From] a fountain within Paradise named Salsabeel.
yusufali: A fountain there, called Salsabil.

malay: Dan mereka dilayani oleh anak-anak muda lelaki yang tetap kekal (dalam keadaan mudanya), yang sentiasa beredar di sekitar mereka; apabila engkau melihat anak-anak muda itu, nescaya engkau menyangkanya mutiara yang bertaburan.
saheeh: There will circulate among them young boys made eternal. When you see them, you would think them [as beautiful as] scattered pearls.
yusufali: And round about them will (serve) youths of perpetual (freshness): If thou seest them, thou wouldst think them scattered Pearls.

malay: Dan apabila engkau melihat di sana (dalam Syurga itu), engkau melihat nikmat yang melimpah-limpah dan kerajaan yang besar (yang tidak ada bandingannya).
saheeh: And when you look there [in Paradise], you will see pleasure and great dominion.
yusufali: And when thou lookest, it is there thou wilt see a Bliss and a Realm Magnificent.

malay: Mereka di dalam Syurga memakai pakaian hijau yang diperbuat dari sutera halus dan sutera tebal (yang bertekat), serta mereka dihiasi dengan gelang-gelang tangan dari perak; dan mereka diberi minum oleh Tuhan mereka dengan sejenis minuman (yang lain) yang bersih suci.
saheeh: Upon the inhabitants will be green garments of fine silk and brocade. And they will be adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a purifying drink.
yusufali: Upon them will be green Garments of fine silk and heavy brocade, and they will be adorned with Bracelets of silver; and their Lord will give to them to drink of a Wine Pure and Holy.

malay: (Serta dikatakan kepada mereka): "Sesungguhnya (segala pemberian) ini adalah untuk kamu sebagai balasan, dan adalah usaha amal kamu (di dunia dahulu) diterima dan dihargai (oleh Allah)".
saheeh: [And it will be said], "Indeed, this is for you a reward, and your effort has been appreciated."
yusufali: "Verily this is a Reward for you, and your Endeavour is accepted and recognised."

malay: Sesungguhnya Kami telah menurunkan Al-Quran kepadamu (wahai Muhammad), dengan beransur-ansur.
saheeh: Indeed, it is We who have sent down to you, [O Muhammad], the Qur'an progressively.
yusufali: It is We Who have sent down the Qur'an to thee by stages.

malay: Oleh itu hendaklah engkau bersabar menerima hukum Tuhanmu (memberi tempoh kepada golongan yang menentangmu), dan janganlah engkau menurut kehendak orang yang berdosa di antara mereka, atau orang yang kufur ingkar.
saheeh: So be patient for the decision of your Lord and do not obey from among them a sinner or ungrateful [disbeliever].
yusufali: Therefore be patient with constancy to the Command of thy Lord, and hearken not to the sinner or the ingrate among them.

malay: Dan sebutlah dengan lidah atau dengan hati akan nama Tuhanmu (di dalam dan di luar sembahyang), pada waktu pagi dan petang;
saheeh: And mention the name of your Lord [in prayer] morning and evening
yusufali: And celebrate the name of thy Lord morning and evening,

malay: Dan (dengan apa keadaan pun maka) pada sebahagian dari waktu malam sujudlah kepada Tuhan (dengan mengerjakan sembahyang), dan (seboleh-bolehnya) bertasbihlah memujiNya (dengan mengerjakan sembahyang Tahajjud), pada sebahagian yang panjang dari waktu malam.
saheeh: And during the night prostrate to Him and exalt Him a long [part of the] night.
yusufali: And part of the night, prostrate thyself to Him; and glorify Him a long night through.

malay: Sesungguhnya orang-orang (yang menentangmu) itu sentiasa mencintai (kesenangan dan kemewahan dunia) yang cepat habisnya, serta mereka membelakangkan (tidak menghiraukan bekalan) untuk hari akhirat yang amat berat (penderitaannya kepada orang-orang yang tidak bertaqwa).
saheeh: Indeed, these [disbelievers] love the immediate and leave behind them a grave Day.
yusufali: As to these, they love the fleeting life, and put away behind them a Day (that will be) hard.

malay: Kamilah yang menciptakan mereka serta menguatkan tulang sendi dan urat saraf mereka; (Kami berkuasa membinasakan mereka) dan apabila Kami kehendaki, Kami gantikan (mereka dengan) orang-orang yang serupa dengan mereka, dengan penggantian yang sebaik-baiknya.
saheeh: We have created them and strengthened their forms, and when We will, We can change their likenesses with [complete] alteration.
yusufali: It is We Who created them, and We have made their joints strong; but, when We will, We can substitute the like of them by a complete change.

malay: Sesungguhnya (segala keterangan yang disebutkan) ini, menjadi peringatan; maka sesiapa yang mahukan (kebaikan dirinya) bolehlah ia mengambil jalan yang menyampaikan kepada keredaan Allah (dengan iman dan taat).
saheeh: Indeed, this is a reminder, so he who wills may take to his Lord a way.
yusufali: This is an admonition: Whosoever will, let him take a (straight) Path to his Lord.

malay: Dan tiadalah kamu berkemahuan (melakukan sesuatu perkara) melainkan dengan cara yang dikehendaki Allah; sesungguhnya Allah adalah Maha Mengetahui, lagi Maha Bijaksana (mengaturkan sebarang perkara yang dikehendakiNya).
saheeh: And you do not will except that Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is ever Knowing and Wise.
yusufali: But ye will not, except as Allah wills; for Allah is full of Knowledge and Wisdom.

malay: Ia memasukkan sesiapa yang dikehendakiNya (menurut aturan yang ditetapkan) ke dalam rahmatNya (dengan ditempatkannya di dalam Syurga); dan orang-orang yang zalim, Ia menyediakan untuk mereka azab seksa yang tidak terperi sakitnya.
saheeh: He admits whom He wills into His mercy; but the wrongdoers - He has prepared for them a painful punishment.
yusufali: He will admit to His Mercy whom He will; But the wrong-doers,- for them has He prepared a grievous Penalty.

malay: Demi (makhluk-makhluk) yang dihantarkan berturut-turut (menjalankan tugasnya),
saheeh: By those [winds] sent forth in gusts
yusufali: By the (Winds) sent forth one after another (to man's profit);

malay: Juga yang merempuh mara dengan sekencang-kencangnya,
saheeh: And the winds that blow violently
yusufali: Which then blow violently in tempestuous Gusts,

malay: Dan demi (makhluk-makhluk) yang menyebarkan (pengajaran dan peringatan) dengan sebaran yang sesungguh-sungguhnya,
saheeh: And [by] the winds that spread [clouds]
yusufali: And scatter (things) far and wide;

malay: Serta yang memisahkan (antara yang benar dengan yang salah) dengan pemisahan yang sejelas-jelasnya,
saheeh: And those [angels] who bring criterion
yusufali: Then separate them, one from another,

malay: Lalu menyampaikan pengajaran dan peringatan (kepada manusia),
saheeh: And those [angels] who deliver a message
yusufali: Then spread abroad a Message,

malay: Untuk menghapuskan kesalahan orang-orang yang bertaubat serta memperbaiki keadaan dirinya, dan untuk menakutkan orang-orang yang ingkar - derhaka; -
saheeh: As justification or warning,
yusufali: Whether of Justification or of Warning;-

malay: (Sumpah demi sumpah) sesungguhnya segala yang dijanjikan kepada kamu tetap berlaku.
saheeh: Indeed, what you are promised is to occur.
yusufali: Assuredly, what ye are promised must come to pass.

malay: Oleh itu, apabila bintang-bintang (binasa dan) hilang lenyap;
saheeh: So when the stars are obliterated
yusufali: Then when the stars become dim;

malay: Dan apabila langit terbelah;
saheeh: And when the heaven is opened
yusufali: When the heaven is cleft asunder;

malay: Dan apabila gunung-ganang hancur lebur berterbangan;
saheeh: And when the mountains are blown away
yusufali: When the mountains are scattered (to the winds) as dust;

malay: Dan apabila Rasul-rasul ditentukan waktunya untuk dipanggil menjadi saksi terhadap umatnya, (maka sudah tentu manusia akan menerima balasan masing-masing).
saheeh: And when the messengers' time has come...
yusufali: And when the messengers are (all) appointed a time (to collect);-

malay: (Jika ditanya): ke hari yang manakah (perkara-perkara yang besar) itu ditangguhkan?
saheeh: For what Day was it postponed?
yusufali: For what Day are these (portents) deferred?

malay: (Jawabnya): Ke hari pemutusan hukum.
saheeh: For the Day of Judgement.
yusufali: For the Day of Sorting out.

malay: Dan apa jalannya engkau dapat mengetahui kedahsyatan hari pemutusan hukum itu?
saheeh: And what can make you know what is the Day of Judgement?
yusufali: And what will explain to thee what is the Day of Sorting out?

malay: Kecelakaan besar, pada hari itu, bagi orang-orang yang mendustakan (apa yang dijanjikan oleh Rasulnya)!
saheeh: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
yusufali: Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!

malay: Bukankah Kami telah binasakan orang-orang dahulu (yang ingkar derhaka, seperti kaum Nabi Nuh, Aad dan Thamud)?
saheeh: Did We not destroy the former peoples?
yusufali: Did We not destroy the men of old (for their evil)?

malay: Kemudian kami akan iringi mereka dengan (membinasakan orang-orang yang ingkar derhaka, dari) kaum-kaum yang datang kemudian.
saheeh: Then We will follow them with the later ones.
yusufali: So shall We make later (generations) follow them.

malay: Demikian cara kami lakukan terhadap sesiapa yang berdosa.
saheeh: Thus do We deal with the criminals.
yusufali: Thus do We deal with men of sin.

malay: Kecelakaan besar, pada hari itu, bagi orang-orang yang mendustakan (apa yang Kami janjikan)!
saheeh: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
yusufali: Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!

malay: Bukankah Kami telah menciptakan kamu dari air (benih) yang sedikit dipandang orang?
saheeh: Did We not create you from a liquid disdained?
yusufali: Have We not created you from a fluid (held) despicable?-

malay: Lalu Kami jadikan air (benih) itu pada tempat penetapan yang kukuh,
saheeh: And We placed it in a firm lodging
yusufali: The which We placed in a place of rest, firmly fixed,

malay: Hingga ke suatu masa yang termaklum?
saheeh: For a known extent.
yusufali: For a period (of gestation), determined (according to need)?

malay: Serta Kami tentukan (keadaannya), maka Kamilah sebaik-baik yang berkuasa menentukan dan melakukan (tiap-tiap sesuatu)!
saheeh: And We determined [it], and excellent [are We] to determine.
yusufali: For We do determine (according to need); for We are the best to determine (things).

malay: Kecelakaan besar, pada hari itu, bagi orang-orang yang mendustakan (kekuasaan Kami)!
saheeh: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
yusufali: Ah woe, that Day! to the Rejecters of Truth!

malay: Bukankah Kami telah menjadikan bumi (sebagai tempat) penampung dan penghimpun (penduduknya)? -
saheeh: Have We not made the earth a container
yusufali: Have We not made the earth (as a place) to draw together.

malay: Yang hidup dan yang mati?
saheeh: Of the living and the dead?
yusufali: The living and the dead,

malay: Dan Kami telah jadikan di bumi: gunung-ganang yang menetapnya, yang tinggi menjulang; dan Kami telah memberi minum kepada kamu air yang tawar lagi memuaskan dahaga?
saheeh: And We placed therein lofty, firmly set mountains and have given you to drink sweet water.
yusufali: And made therein mountains standing firm, lofty (in stature); and provided for you water sweet (and wholesome)?

malay: Kecelakaan besar, pada hari itu, bagi orang-orang yang mendustakan (nikmat-nikmat pemberian Kami)!
saheeh: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
yusufali: Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!

malay: (Dikatakan kepada mereka semasa ditimpakan dengan azab): "Pergilah kepada azab yang dahulu kamu mendustakannya.
saheeh: [They will be told], "Proceed to that which you used to deny.
yusufali: (It will be said:) "Depart ye to that which ye used to reject as false!

malay: "Pergilah kamu kepada naungan (asap neraka) yang bercabang tiga, -
saheeh: Proceed to a shadow [of smoke] having three columns
yusufali: "Depart ye to a Shadow (of smoke ascending) in three columns,

malay: "Yang tidak dapat dijadikan naungan, dan tidak dapat memberikan sebarang lindungan dari julangan api neraka.
saheeh: [But having] no cool shade and availing not against the flame."
yusufali: "(Which yields) no shade of coolness, and is of no use against the fierce Blaze.

malay: "Sesungguhnya neraka itu melemparkan bunga api, (yang besarnya) seperti bangunan besar,
saheeh: Indeed, it throws sparks [as huge] as a fortress,
yusufali: "Indeed it throws about sparks (huge) as Forts,

malay: "(Banyaknya dan warnanya) bunga api itu seolah-olah rombongan unta kuning".
saheeh: As if they were yellowish [black] camels.
yusufali: "As if there were (a string of) yellow camels (marching swiftly)."

malay: Kecelakaan besar, pada hari itu, bagi orang-orang yang mendustakan (keadaan yang demikian).
saheeh: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
yusufali: Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!

malay: Inilah hari mereka tidak dapat berkata-kata, (kerana masing-masing terpinga-pinga ketakutan),
saheeh: This is a Day they will not speak,
yusufali: That will be a Day when they shall not be able to speak.

malay: Dan tidak pula diizinkan mereka bercakap, maka mereka tidak dapat meminta maaf.
saheeh: Nor will it be permitted for them to make an excuse.
yusufali: Nor will it be open to them to put forth pleas.

malay: Kecelakaan besar, pada hari itu, bagi orang-orang yang mendustakan (hari akhirat)!
saheeh: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
yusufali: Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!

malay: Inilah hari pemutusan hukum (yang menentukan siapa yang benar dan siapa yang salah). Kami himpunkan kamu bersama orang-orang yang terdahulu (dari kamu).
saheeh: This is the Day of Judgement; We will have assembled you and the former peoples.
yusufali: That will be a Day of Sorting out! We shall gather you together and those before (you)!

malay: Oleh itu, kalau kamu ada sebarang tipu-helah melepaskan diri, maka cubalah kamu lakukan terhadap azabKu.
saheeh: So if you have a plan, then plan against Me.
yusufali: Now, if ye have a trick (or plot), use it against Me!

malay: Kecelakaan besar, pada hari itu, bagi orang-orang yang mendustakan (apa yang telah dijanjikan oleh Allah)!
saheeh: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
yusufali: Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!

malay: Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang bertaqwa berada di tempat teduh (yang dipenuhi pelbagai nikmat), dan yang berdekatan dengan matair-matair (yang mengalir), -
saheeh: Indeed, the righteous will be among shades and springs
yusufali: As to the Righteous, they shall be amidst (cool) shades and springs (of water).

malay: Serta menikmati buah-buahan dari segala jenis yang mereka ingini.
saheeh: And fruits from whatever they desire,
yusufali: And (they shall have) fruits,- all they desire.

malay: (Pada ketika itu dikatakan kepada mereka): "Makanlah dan minumlah kamu dengan lazatnya, disebabkan apa yang kamu telah kerjakan."
saheeh: [Being told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do."
yusufali: "Eat ye and drink ye to your heart's content: for that ye worked (Righteousness).

malay: Sesungguhnya, demikianlah Kami membalas orang-orang yang berusaha mengerjakan amal-amal yang baik.
saheeh: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
yusufali: Thus do We certainly reward the Doers of Good.

malay: Kecelakaan besar, pada hari itu, bagi orang-orang yang mendustakan (nikmat-nikmat Syurga)!
saheeh: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
yusufali: Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!

malay: Makanlah dan bersenang-senanglah kamu (wahai orang-orang yang ingkar derhaka) sementara waktu hidup, (kemudian kamu akan menghadapi bahaya), kerana sesungguhnya kamu adalah orang-orang yang berdosa.
saheeh: [O disbelievers], eat and enjoy yourselves a little; indeed, you are criminals.
yusufali: (O ye unjust!) Eat ye and enjoy yourselves (but) a little while, for that ye are Sinners.

malay: Kecelakaan besar, pada hari itu, bagi orang-orang yang mendustakan (amaran Allah), -
saheeh: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
yusufali: Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!

malay: Dan apabila dikatakan kepada mereka (yang ingkar): "Taatlah dan kerjakanlah sembahyang", mereka enggan mengerjakannya.
saheeh: And when it is said to them, "Bow [in prayer]," they do not bow.
yusufali: And when it is said to them, "Prostrate yourselves!" they do not so.

malay: Kecelakaan besar, pada hari itu, bagi orang-orang yang mendustakan (perintah-perintah Allah dan laranganNya)!
saheeh: Woe, that Day, to the deniers.
yusufali: Ah woe, that Day, to the Rejecters of Truth!

malay: (Kalau mereka tidak juga mahu beriman kepada keterangan-keterangan yang tersebut) maka kepada perkataan yang mana lagi, sesudah itu, mereka mahu beriman?
saheeh: Then in what statement after the Qur'an will they believe?
yusufali: Then what Message, after that, will they believe in?

malay: Tentang apakah mereka bertanya-tanya?
saheeh: About what are they asking one another?
yusufali: Concerning what are they disputing?

malay: Tentang berita yang besar, (berita kebangkitan manusia hidup semula menerima balasannya).
saheeh: About the great news -
yusufali: Concerning the Great News,

malay: Yang mereka (ragu-ragu dan) berselisihan mengenainya.
saheeh: That over which they are in disagreement.
yusufali: About which they cannot agree.

malay: Jangan! (Janganlah mereka bersikap demikian!) Mereka akan mengetahui (dengan yakin tentang kebenaran hari balasan itu).
saheeh: No! They are going to know.
yusufali: Verily, they shall soon (come to) know!

malay: Sekali lagi jangan! (Janganlah mereka berselisihan!) Mereka akan mengetahui kelak (tentang apa yang akan menimpa mereka).
saheeh: Then, no! They are going to know.
yusufali: Verily, verily they shall soon (come to) know!

malay: (Mengapa kamu ragu-ragukan kekuasaan Kami menghidupkan semula orang-orang yang telah mati?) Bukankah Kami telah menjadikan bumi (terbentang luas) sebagai hamparan?
saheeh: Have We not made the earth a resting place?
yusufali: Have We not made the earth as a wide expanse,

malay: Dan gunung-ganang sebagai pancang pasaknya?
saheeh: And the mountains as stakes?
yusufali: And the mountains as pegs?

malay: Dan Kami telah menciptakan kamu berpasang-pasang?
saheeh: And We created you in pairs
yusufali: And (have We not) created you in pairs,

malay: Dan Kami telah menjadikan tidur kamu untuk berehat?
saheeh: And made your sleep [a means for] rest
yusufali: And made your sleep for rest,

malay: Dan Kami telah menjadikan malam (dengan gelapnya) sebagai pakaian (yang melindungi)?
saheeh: And made the night as clothing
yusufali: And made the night as a covering,

malay: Dan Kami telah menjadikan siang (dengan cahaya terangnya) - masa untuk mencari rezeki?
saheeh: And made the day for livelihood
yusufali: And made the day as a means of subsistence?

malay: Dan Kami telah membina di atas kamu tujuh petala (langit) yang kuat kukuh?
saheeh: And constructed above you seven strong [heavens]
yusufali: And (have We not) built over you the seven firmaments,

malay: Dan Kami telah mengadakan matahari menjadi lampu yang terang-benderang cahayanya?
saheeh: And made [therein] a burning lamp
yusufali: And placed (therein) a Light of Splendour?

malay: Dan Kami telah menurunkan dari awan, air (hujan) yang mencurah-curah, -
saheeh: And sent down, from the rain clouds, pouring water
yusufali: And do We not send down from the clouds water in abundance,

malay: Untuk Kami mengeluarkan dengan air itu, biji-bijian dan tumbuh-tumbuhan, -
saheeh: That We may bring forth thereby grain and vegetation
yusufali: That We may produce therewith corn and vegetables,

malay: Serta kebun-kebun yang subur bertaut-taut pokoknya?
saheeh: And gardens of entwined growth.
yusufali: And gardens of luxurious growth?

malay: Sesungguhnya hari pemutusan hukum itu, adalah satu masa yang ditentukan,
saheeh: Indeed, the Day of Judgement is an appointed time -
yusufali: Verily the Day of Sorting out is a thing appointed,

malay: Iaitu masa ditiup sangkakala, lalu kamu (bangkit hidup) serta datang berpuak-puak (ke Padang Mahsyar);
saheeh: The Day the Horn is blown and you will come forth in multitudes
yusufali: The Day that the Trumpet shall be sounded, and ye shall come forth in crowds;

malay: Dan (pada masa itu) langit dipecah belahkan sehingga tiap-tiap belahannya menjadi ibarat pintu yang terbuka luas,
saheeh: And the heaven is opened and will become gateways
yusufali: And the heavens shall be opened as if there were doors,

malay: Dan gunung-ganang - setelah dihancurkan - diterbangkan ke angkasa, lalu menjadilah ia bayangan semata-mata seperti riak sinaran panas di padang pasir.
saheeh: And the mountains are removed and will be [but] a mirage.
yusufali: And the mountains shall vanish, as if they were a mirage.

malay: Sesungguhnya neraka Jahannam adalah disediakan -
saheeh: Indeed, Hell has been lying in wait
yusufali: Truly Hell is as a place of ambush,

malay: Untuk orang-orang yang melampaui batas hukum Tuhan, sebagai tempat kembalinya.
saheeh: For the transgressors, a place of return,
yusufali: For the transgressors a place of destination:

malay: Mereka tinggal di dalamnya berkurun-kurun lamanya.
saheeh: In which they will remain for ages [unending].
yusufali: They will dwell therein for ages.

malay: Mereka tidak dapat merasai udara yang sejuk di dalamnya, dan tidak pula sebarang minuman -
saheeh: They will not taste therein [any] coolness or drink
yusufali: Nothing cool shall they taste therein, nor any drink,

malay: Kecuali air panas yang menggelegak, dan air danur yang mengalir, -
saheeh: Except scalding water and [foul] purulence -
yusufali: Save a boiling fluid and a fluid, dark, murky, intensely cold,

malay: Sebagai balasan yang sesuai (dengan amal mereka yang buruk).
saheeh: An appropriate recompense.
yusufali: A fitting recompense (for them).

malay: Kerana sesungguhnya mereka dahulu tidak menaruh ingatan terhadap hari hitungan amal,
saheeh: Indeed, they were not expecting an account
yusufali: For that they used not to fear any account (for their deeds),

malay: Dan mereka telah mendustakan dengan sesungguh-sungguhnya akan ayat-ayat keterangan Kami;
saheeh: And denied Our verses with [emphatic] denial.
yusufali: But they (impudently) treated Our Signs as false.

malay: Dan tiap-tiap sesuatu dari bawaan hidupnya, telah Kami hitung secara bertulis.
saheeh: But all things We have enumerated in writing.
yusufali: And all things have We preserved on record.

malay: (Setelah mereka masuk ke dalam neraka, dikatakan kepada mereka: "Oleh sebab kamu telah mendustakan ayat-ayat Kami) maka rasalah kamu (azab yang disediakan), kerana Kami tidak akan melakukan selain dari menambah berbagai azab kepada kamu".
saheeh: "So taste [the penalty], and never will We increase you except in torment."
yusufali: "So taste ye (the fruits of your deeds); for no increase shall We grant you, except in Punishment."

malay: Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang bertaqwa, disediakan Syurga tempat mereka beroleh apa yang mereka ingini.
saheeh: Indeed, for the righteous is attainment -
yusufali: Verily for the Righteous there will be a fulfilment of (the heart's) desires;

malay: (Mereka akan beroleh) taman-taman bunga dan kebun-kebun buah-buahan, terutama anggur;
saheeh: Gardens and grapevines
yusufali: Gardens enclosed, and grapevines;

malay: Dan perawan-perawan yang sebaya umurnya;
saheeh: And full-breasted [companions] of equal age
yusufali: And voluptuous women of equal age;

malay: Serta piala atau gelas yang penuh dengan minuman;
saheeh: And a full cup.
yusufali: And a cup full (to the brim).

malay: Mereka tidak mendengar di dalam Syurga itu perkataan yang sia-sia, dan tiada pula perkataan yang dusta;
saheeh: No ill speech will they hear therein or any falsehood -
yusufali: No vanity shall they hear therein, nor Untruth:-

malay: Sebagai balasan dari Tuhanmu, iaitu satu limpah kurnia yang dikira cukup (menurut yang dijanjikanNya),
saheeh: [As] reward from your Lord, [a generous] gift [made due by] account,
yusufali: Recompense from thy Lord, a gift, (amply) sufficient,

malay: Tuhan yang mentadbirkan tujuh petala langit dan bumi serta apa yang ada di antara keduanya, Tuhan Yang Maha Pemurah, tidak ada sesiapapun diberi kuasa berkata-kata denganNya (untuk memohon pertimbangan tentang balasan atau pengurniaan itu);
saheeh: [From] the Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Most Merciful. They possess not from Him [authority for] speech.
yusufali: (From) the Lord of the heavens and the earth, and all between, (Allah) Most Gracious: None shall have power to argue with Him.

malay: (Tambahan pula) pada masa Jibril dan malaikat-malaikat yang lain berdiri bersaf-saf (menunggu perintah Tuhan), tidak ada yang berani berkata-kata (memohon pertimbangan) melainkan yang telah diizinkan baginya oleh Tuhan Yang Maha Pemurah, serta ia berkata benar.
saheeh: The Day that the Spirit and the angels will stand in rows, they will not speak except for one whom the Most Merciful permits, and he will say what is correct.
yusufali: The Day that the Spirit and the angels will stand forth in ranks, none shall speak except any who is permitted by (Allah) Most Gracious, and He will say what is right.

malay: Itulah keterangan-keterangan mengenai hari (kiamat) yang sungguh tetap berlakunya; maka sesiapa yang mahukan kebaikan dirinya, dapatlah ia mengambil jalan dan cara kembali kepada Tuhannya (dengan iman dan amal yang soleh)!
saheeh: That is the True Day; so he who wills may take to his Lord a [way of] return.
yusufali: That Day will be the sure Reality: Therefore, whoso will, let him take a (straight) return to his Lord!

malay: Sesungguhnya (dengan keterangan-keterangan yang tersebut), Kami memberi amaran kepada kamu mengenai azab yang dekat (masa datangnya), - iaitu hari seseorang melihat apa yang telah diusahakannya; dan orang yang kafir akan berkata (pada hari itu): "Alangkah baiknya kalau aku menjadi tanah (supaya aku tidak dibangkitkan untuk dihitung amalku dan menerima balasan)".
saheeh: Indeed, We have warned you of a near punishment on the Day when a man will observe what his hands have put forth and the disbeliever will say, "Oh, I wish that I were dust!"
yusufali: Verily, We have warned you of a Penalty near, the Day when man will see (the deeds) which his hands have sent forth, and the Unbeliever will say, "Woe unto me! Would that I were (metre) dust!"

malay: Demi (makhluk-makhluk) yang mencabut (apa yang ditugaskan mencabutnya) dengan cara yang sekasar-kasarnya;
saheeh: By those [angels] who extract with violence
yusufali: By the (angels) who tear out (the souls of the wicked) with violence;

malay: Dan yang menarik (apa yang ditugaskan menariknya) dengan cara yang selembut-lembutnya;
saheeh: And [by] those who remove with ease
yusufali: By those who gently draw out (the souls of the blessed);

malay: Dan demi (makhluk-makhluk) yang cergas bergerak (menerima perintah) dengan gerak yang secergas-cergasnya;
saheeh: And [by] those who glide [as if] swimming
yusufali: And by those who glide along (on errands of mercy),

malay: Lalu masing-masing berlumba-lumba dahulu-mendahului (menjalankan tugasnya) dengan cara yang sesungguh-sungguhnya;
saheeh: And those who race each other in a race
yusufali: Then press forward as in a race,

malay: Serta menyempurnakan tadbir urusan alam yang diperintahkan kepadanya; (sumpah demi sumpah, sesungguhnya kamu akan dibangkitkan hidup semula pada hari kiamat)! -
saheeh: And those who arrange [each] matter,
yusufali: Then arrange to do (the Commands of their Lord),

malay: Pada masa berlakunya "tiupan sangkakala yang pertama" yang menggoncangkan alam, (sehingga mati segala yang bernyawa dan punah-ranah sekalian makhluk selain dari yang dikecualikan),
saheeh: On the Day the blast [of the Horn] will convulse [creation],
yusufali: One Day everything that can be in commotion will be in violent commotion,

malay: Tiupan yang pertama itu diikuti oleh tiupan yang kedua, (yang menyebabkan orang-orang yang mati semuanya hidup semula serta keluar dari kubur masing-masing);
saheeh: There will follow it the subsequent [one].
yusufali: Followed by oft-repeated (commotions):

malay: Hati (manusia) pada hari itu berdebar-debar takut,
saheeh: Hearts, that Day, will tremble,
yusufali: Hearts that Day will be in agitation;

malay: Pemandangannya tunduk gerun.
saheeh: Their eyes humbled.
yusufali: Cast down will be (their owners') eyes.

malay: Mereka (yang ingkar) berkata: "Sungguhkah kita akan dikembalikan hidup seperti keadaan di dunia dahulu?
saheeh: They are [presently] saying, "Will we indeed be returned to [our] former state [of life]?
yusufali: They say (now): "What! shall we indeed be returned to (our) former state?

malay: "Bolehkah (dihidupkan semula) sesudah kita menjadi tulang yang reput?"
saheeh: Even if we should be decayed bones?
yusufali: "What! - when we shall have become rotten bones?"

malay: Mereka berkata lagi (secara mengejek: "Kalaulah berlaku) yang demikian, sudah tentu kembalinya kita (hidup semula) itu satu perkara yang merugikan!"
saheeh: They say, "That, then, would be a losing return."
yusufali: They say: "It would, in that case, be a return with loss!"

malay: (Menghidupkan semula tidaklah sukar), kerana berlakunya perkara itu hanyalah dengan satu jeritan (yang terbit dari tiupan sangkakala yang kedua), -
saheeh: Indeed, it will be but one shout,
yusufali: But verily, it will be but a single (Compelling) Cry,

malay: Yang menyebabkan mereka dengan serta-merta berada di muka bumi yang putih rata.
saheeh: And suddenly they will be [alert] upon the earth's surface.
yusufali: When, behold, they will be in the (full) awakening (to Judgment).

malay: Sudahkah sampai kepadamu (wahai Muhammad) perihal Nabi Musa?
saheeh: Has there reached you the story of Moses? -
yusufali: Has the story of Moses reached thee?

malay: Ketika ia diseru oleh Tuhannya di "Wadi Tuwa" yang suci; -
saheeh: When his Lord called to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa,
yusufali: Behold, thy Lord did call to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa:-

malay: (Lalu diperintahkan kepadanya): "Pergilah kepada Firaun, sesungguhnya ia telah melampaui batas (dalam kekufuran dan kezalimannya);
saheeh: "Go to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed.
yusufali: "Go thou to Pharaoh for he has indeed transgressed all bounds:

malay: "Serta katakanlah kepadanya: `Adakah engkau suka hendak mensucikan dirimu (dari kekufuran)?
saheeh: And say to him, 'Would you [be willing to] purify yourself
yusufali: "And say to him, 'Wouldst thou that thou shouldst be purified (from sin)?-

malay: `Dan mahukah, aku tunjuk kepadamu jalan mengenal Tuhanmu, supaya engkau merasa takut (melanggar perintahNya)? ' "
saheeh: And let me guide you to your Lord so you would fear [Him]?'"
yusufali: "'And that I guide thee to thy Lord, so thou shouldst fear Him?'"

malay: (Setelah Nabi Musa menyempurnakan perintah Tuhannya, dan Firaun pun meminta bukti kebenarannya); maka Nabi Musa memperlihatkan kepada Firaun: mukjizat yang besar.
saheeh: And he showed him the greatest sign,
yusufali: Then did (Moses) show him the Great Sign.

malay: Lalu Firaun mendustakan (Nabi Musa) dan menderhaka (kepada Allah);
saheeh: But Pharaoh denied and disobeyed.
yusufali: But (Pharaoh) rejected it and disobeyed (guidance);

malay: Kemudian ia berpaling ingkar sambil menjalankan usahanya (menentang Nabi Musa).
saheeh: Then he turned his back, striving.
yusufali: Further, he turned his back, striving hard (against Allah).

malay: Lalu ia menghimpunkan orang-orangnya dan menyeru, -
saheeh: And he gathered [his people] and called out
yusufali: Then he collected (his men) and made a proclamation,

malay: Dengan berkata: "Akulah tuhan kamu, yang tertinggi".
saheeh: And said, "I am your most exalted lord."
yusufali: Saying, "I am your Lord, Most High".

malay: Maka Allah menyeksa Firaun di akhirat dan di dunia ini, dengan azab yang menakutkan sesiapa yang mengetahuinya.
saheeh: So Allah seized him in exemplary punishment for the last and the first [transgression].
yusufali: But Allah did punish him, (and made an) example of him, - in the Hereafter, as in this life.

malay: Sesungguhnya yang demikian itu mengandungi pelajaran yang mendatangkan iktibar bagi orang-orang yang takut (melanggar perintah Tuhannya).
saheeh: Indeed in that is a warning for whoever would fear [Allah].
yusufali: Verily in this is an instructive warning for whosoever feareth (Allah).

malay: (Wahai golongan yang ingkarkan kebangkitan hidup semula!) Kamukah yang sukar diciptakan atau langit? Tuhan telah membinanya (dengan Kukuh)!
saheeh: Are you a more difficult creation or is the heaven? Allah constructed it.
yusufali: What! Are ye the more difficult to create or the heaven (above)? (Allah) hath constructed it:

malay: Ia telah meninggikan bangunan langit itu lalu menyempurnaKannya,
saheeh: He raised its ceiling and proportioned it.
yusufali: On high hath He raised its canopy, and He hath given it order and perfection.

malay: Dan Ia menjadikan malamnya gelap-gelita, serta menjadikan siangnya terang-benderang.
saheeh: And He darkened its night and extracted its brightness.
yusufali: Its night doth He endow with darkness, and its splendour doth He bring out (with light).

malay: Dan bumi sesudah itu dihamparkannya (untuk kemudahan penduduknya), -
saheeh: And after that He spread the earth.
yusufali: And the earth, moreover, hath He extended (to a wide expanse);

malay: Ia mengeluarkan dari bumi itu: airnya dan tumbuh-tumbuhannya;
saheeh: He extracted from it its water and its pasture,
yusufali: He draweth out therefrom its moisture and its pasture;

malay: Dan gunung-ganang pula dikukuhkan letaknya (di bumi, sebagai pancang pasak yang menetapnya);
saheeh: And the mountains He set firmly
yusufali: And the mountains hath He firmly fixed;-

malay: (Semuanya itu) untuk kegunaan kamu dan binatang-binatang ternak kamu.
saheeh: As provision for you and your grazing livestock.
yusufali: For use and convenience to you and your cattle.

malay: Maka apabila datang hari yang bencananya amat besar, -
saheeh: But when there comes the greatest Overwhelming Calamity -
yusufali: Therefore, when there comes the great, overwhelming (Event),-

malay: Iaitu hari manusia akan mengingati apa yang telah diusahakannya, -
saheeh: The Day when man will remember that for which he strove,
yusufali: The Day when man shall remember (all) that he strove for,

malay: Dan neraka diperlihatkan kepada sesiapa sahaja yang dapat melihatnya, -
saheeh: And Hellfire will be exposed for [all] those who see -
yusufali: And Hell-Fire shall be placed in full view for (all) to see,-

malay: Maka (dapatlah masing-masing mengetahui kesudahannya); adapun orang yang melampau (perbuatan derhakanya), -
saheeh: So as for he who transgressed
yusufali: Then, for such as had transgressed all bounds,

malay: Serta ia mengutamakan kehidupan dunia semata-mata, -
saheeh: And preferred the life of the world,
yusufali: And had preferred the life of this world,

malay: Maka sesungguhnya neraka Jahanamlah tempat kediamannya.
saheeh: Then indeed, Hellfire will be [his] refuge.
yusufali: The Abode will be Hell-Fire;

malay: Adapun orang yang takutkan keadaan semasa ia berdiri di mahkamah Tuhannya, (untuk dihitung amalnya), serta ia menahan dirinya dari menurut hawa nafsu, -
saheeh: But as for he who feared the position of his Lord and prevented the soul from [unlawful] inclination,
yusufali: And for such as had entertained the fear of standing before their Lord's (tribunal) and had restrained (their) soul from lower desires,

malay: Maka sesungguhnya Syurgalah tempat kediamannya.
saheeh: Then indeed, Paradise will be [his] refuge.
yusufali: Their abode will be the Garden.

malay: Mereka (yang ingkar) selalu bertanya kepadamu (wahai Muhammad) tentang hari kiamat: "Bilakah masa datangnya?"
saheeh: They ask you, [O Muhammad], about the Hour: when is its arrival?
yusufali: They ask thee about the Hour,-'When will be its appointed time?

malay: Apa hubungannya tugasmu dengan (soal) menerangkan masa kedatangan hari kiamat itu?
saheeh: In what [position] are you that you should mention it?
yusufali: Wherein art thou (concerned) with the declaration thereof?

malay: Kepada Tuhanmu lah terserah kesudahan ilmu mengenainya.
saheeh: To your Lord is its finality.
yusufali: With thy Lord in the Limit fixed therefor.

malay: Tugasmu hanyalah memberi amaran kepada orang yang takut akan huru-hara hari kiamat itu.
saheeh: You are only a warner for those who fear it.
yusufali: Thou art but a Warner for such as fear it.

malay: (Sangatlah dahsyatnya huru-hara hari itu, sehingga orang-orang yang bersalah merasa) pada masa melihatnya: seolah-olah mereka tidak tinggal di dunia melainkan sekadar satu petang atau paginya sahaja.
saheeh: It will be, on the Day they see it, as though they had not remained [in the world] except for an afternoon or a morning thereof.
yusufali: The Day they see it, (It will be) as if they had tarried but a single evening, or (at most till) the following morn!

malay: Ia memasamkan muka dan berpaling,
saheeh: The Prophet frowned and turned away
yusufali: (The Prophet) frowned and turned away,

malay: Kerana ia didatangi orang buta.
saheeh: Because there came to him the blind man, [interrupting].
yusufali: Because there came to him the blind man (interrupting).

malay: Dan apa jalannya engkau dapat mengetahui (tujuannya, wahai Muhammad) ? Barangkali ia mahu membersihkan hatinya (dengan pelajaran agama yang didapatinya daripadamu)! -
saheeh: But what would make you perceive, [O Muhammad], that perhaps he might be purified
yusufali: But what could tell thee but that perchance he might grow (in spiritual understanding)?-

malay: Ataupun ia mahu mendapat peringatan, supaya peringatan itu memberi manfaat kepadanya.
saheeh: Or be reminded and the remembrance would benefit him?
yusufali: Or that he might receive admonition, and the teaching might profit him?

malay: Adapun orang yang merasa keadaannya telah cukup, tidak berhajat lagi (kepada ajaran Al-Quran),
saheeh: As for he who thinks himself without need,
