yusufali: As to one who regards Himself as self-sufficient,

malay: Maka engkau bersungguh-sungguh melayaninya.
saheeh: To him you give attention.
yusufali: To him dost thou attend;

malay: Padahal engkau tidak bersalah kalau ia tidak mahu membersihkan dirinya (dari keingkarannya).
saheeh: And not upon you [is any blame] if he will not be purified.
yusufali: Though it is no blame to thee if he grow not (in spiritual understanding).

malay: Adapun orang yang segera datang kepadamu,
saheeh: But as for he who came to you striving [for knowledge]
yusufali: But as to him who came to thee striving earnestly,

malay: Dengan perasaan takutnya (melanggar perintah-perintah Allah), -
saheeh: While he fears [Allah],
yusufali: And with fear (in his heart),

malay: Maka engkau berlengah-lengah melayaninya.
saheeh: From him you are distracted.
yusufali: Of him wast thou unmindful.

malay: Janganlah melakukan lagi yang sedemikian itu! Sebenarnya ayat-ayat Al-Quran adalah pengajaran dan peringatan (yang mencukupi).
saheeh: No! Indeed, these verses are a reminder;
yusufali: By no means (should it be so)! For it is indeed a Message of instruction:

malay: Maka sesiapa yang mahukan kebaikan dirinya, dapatlah ia mengambil peringatan daripadanya.
saheeh: So whoever wills may remember it.
yusufali: Therefore let whoso will, keep it in remembrance.

malay: (Ayat-ayat Suci itu tersimpan) dalam naskhah-naskhah yang dimuliakan, -
saheeh: [It is recorded] in honored sheets,
yusufali: (It is) in Books held (greatly) in honour,

malay: Yang tinggi darjatnya, lagi suci (dari segala gangguan), -
saheeh: Exalted and purified,
yusufali: Exalted (in dignity), kept pure and holy,

malay: (Terpelihara) di tangan malaikat-malaikat yang menyalinnya dari Lauh Mahfuz;
saheeh: [Carried] by the hands of messenger-angels,
yusufali: (Written) by the hands of scribes-

malay: (Malaikat-malaikat) yang mulia, lagi yang berbakti.
saheeh: Noble and dutiful.
yusufali: Honourable and Pious and Just.

malay: Binasalah hendaknya manusia (yang ingkar) itu, betapa besar kekufurannya?
saheeh: Cursed is man; how disbelieving is he.
yusufali: Woe to man! What hath made him reject Allah;

malay: (Tidakkah ia memikirkan) dari apakah ia diciptakan oleh Allah? -
saheeh: From what substance did He create him?
yusufali: From what stuff hath He created him?

malay: Dari air mani diciptakanNya, serta dilengkapkan keadaannya dengan persediaan untuk bertanggungjawab;
saheeh: From a sperm-drop He created him and destined for him;
yusufali: From a sperm-drop: He hath created him, and then mouldeth him in due proportions;

malay: Kemudian jalan (baik dan jahat), dimudahkan Tuhan kepadanya (untuk menimbang dan mengambil mana satu yang ia pilih);
saheeh: Then He eased the way for him;
yusufali: Then doth He make His path smooth for him;

malay: Kemudian dimatikannya, lalu diperintahkan supaya ia dikuburkan;
saheeh: Then He causes his death and provides a grave for him.
yusufali: Then He causeth him to die, and putteth him in his grave;

malay: Kemudian apabila Allah kehendaki dibangkitkannya (hidup semula).
saheeh: Then when He wills, He will resurrect him.
yusufali: Then, when it is His Will, He will raise him up (again).

malay: Janganlah hendaknya ia kufur ingkar lagi! Sebenarnya ia belum menunaikan apa yang diperintahkan kepadanya.
saheeh: No! Man has not yet accomplished what He commanded him.
yusufali: By no means hath he fulfilled what Allah hath commanded him.

malay: (Kalaulah ia tidak memikirkan asal dan kesudahan dirinya), maka hendaklah manusia melihat kepada makanannya (bagaimana kami mentadbirkannya):
saheeh: Then let mankind look at his food -
yusufali: Then let man look at his food, (and how We provide it):

malay: Sesungguhnya kami telah mencurahkan hujan dengan curahan yang menakjubkan.
saheeh: How We poured down water in torrents,
yusufali: For that We pour forth water in abundance,

malay: Kemudian kami belah-belahkan bumi dengan belahan yang sesuai dengan tumbuh-tumbuhan, -
saheeh: Then We broke open the earth, splitting [it with sprouts],
yusufali: And We split the earth in fragments,

malay: Lalu Kami tumbuhkan pada bumi biji-bijian,
saheeh: And caused to grow within it grain
yusufali: And produce therein corn,

malay: Dan buah anggur serta sayur-sayuran,
saheeh: And grapes and herbage
yusufali: And Grapes and nutritious plants,

malay: Dan Zaitun serta pohon-pohon kurma,
saheeh: And olive and palm trees
yusufali: And Olives and Dates,

malay: Dan taman-taman yang menghijau subur,
saheeh: And gardens of dense shrubbery
yusufali: And enclosed Gardens, dense with lofty trees,

malay: Dan berbagai buah-buahan serta bermacam-macam rumput, -
saheeh: And fruit and grass -
yusufali: And fruits and fodder,-

malay: Untuk kegunaan kamu dan binatang-binatang ternak kamu.
saheeh: [As] enjoyment for you and your grazing livestock.
yusufali: For use and convenience to you and your cattle.

malay: Kemudian (ingatlah keadaan yang berlaku) apabila datang suara jeritan yang dahsyat, -
saheeh: But when there comes the Deafening Blast
yusufali: At length, when there comes the Deafening Noise,-

malay: Pada hari seseorang itu lari dari saudaranya,
saheeh: On the Day a man will flee from his brother
yusufali: That Day shall a man flee from his own brother,

malay: Dan ibunya serta bapanya,
saheeh: And his mother and his father
yusufali: And from his mother and his father,

malay: Dan isterinya serta anak-anaknya; -
saheeh: And his wife and his children,
yusufali: And from his wife and his children.

malay: Kerana tiap-tiap seorang dari mereka pada hari itu, ada perkara-perkara yang cukup untuk menjadikannya sibuk dengan hal dirinya sahaja.
saheeh: For every man, that Day, will be a matter adequate for him.
yusufali: Each one of them, that Day, will have enough concern (of his own) to make him indifferent to the others.

malay: Muka (orang-orang yang beriman) pada hari itu berseri-seri,
saheeh: [Some] faces, that Day, will be bright -
yusufali: Some faces that Day will be beaming,

malay: Tertawa, lagi bersuka ria;
saheeh: Laughing, rejoicing at good news.
yusufali: Laughing, rejoicing.

malay: Dan muka (orang-orang yang ingkar) pada hari itu penuh berdebu,
saheeh: And [other] faces, that Day, will have upon them dust.
yusufali: And other faces that Day will be dust-stained,

malay: Diliputi oleh warna hitam legam dan gelap-gelita. -
saheeh: Blackness will cover them.
yusufali: Blackness will cover them:

malay: Mereka itu ialah orang-orang yang kafir, yang derhaka.
saheeh: Those are the disbelievers, the wicked ones.
yusufali: Such will be the Rejecters of Allah, the doers of iniquity.

malay: Apabila matahari dilingkari cahayanya (dan hilang lenyap);
saheeh: When the sun is wrapped up [in darkness]
yusufali: When the sun (with its spacious light) is folded up;

malay: Dan apabila bintang-bintang gugur berselerak;
saheeh: And when the stars fall, dispersing,
yusufali: When the stars fall, losing their lustre;

malay: Dan apabila gunung-ganang di terbangkan ke angkasa (setelah dihancurkan menjadi debu);
saheeh: And when the mountains are removed
yusufali: When the mountains vanish (like a mirage);

malay: Dan apabila unta-unta yang bunting terbiar;
saheeh: And when full-term she-camels are neglected
yusufali: When the she-camels, ten months with young, are left untended;

malay: Dan apabila binatang-binatang liar dihimpunkan;
saheeh: And when the wild beasts are gathered
yusufali: When the wild beasts are herded together (in the human habitations);

malay: Dan apabila lautan meluap-luap bercampur-baur;
saheeh: And when the seas are filled with flame
yusufali: When the oceans boil over with a swell;

malay: Dan apabila tiap-tiap diri disatukan dengan pasangannya;
saheeh: And when the souls are paired
yusufali: When the souls are sorted out, (being joined, like with like);

malay: Dan apabila anak perempuan yang ditanam hidup-hidup: ditanya, -
saheeh: And when the girl [who was] buried alive is asked
yusufali: When the female (infant), buried alive, is questioned -

malay: Dengan dosa apakah ia dibunuh?
saheeh: For what sin she was killed
yusufali: For what crime she was killed;

malay: Dan apabila surat-surat amal dibentangkan;
saheeh: And when the pages are made public
yusufali: When the scrolls are laid open;

malay: Dan apabila langit ditanggalkan dari tempatnya;
saheeh: And when the sky is stripped away
yusufali: When the world on High is unveiled;

malay: Dan apabila neraka dinyalakan menjulang;
saheeh: And when Hellfire is set ablaze
yusufali: When the Blazing Fire is kindled to fierce heat;

malay: Dan apabila Syurga didekatkan;
saheeh: And when Paradise is brought near,
yusufali: And when the Garden is brought near;-

malay: (Setelah semuanya itu berlaku), tiap-tiap orang akan mengetahui tentang amal yang telah dibawanya.
saheeh: A soul will [then] know what it has brought [with it].
yusufali: (Then) shall each soul know what it has put forward.

malay: Oleh itu, Aku bersumpah dengan bintang-bintang yang tenggelam timbul;
saheeh: So I swear by the retreating stars -
yusufali: So verily I call to witness the planets - that recede,

malay: Yang beredar, juga yang tetap pada tempatnya;
saheeh: Those that run [their courses] and disappear -
yusufali: Go straight, or hide;

malay: Dan malam, apabila ia hampir habis,
saheeh: And by the night as it closes in
yusufali: And the Night as it dissipates;

malay: Dan siang, apabila ia mulai terang;
saheeh: And by the dawn when it breathes
yusufali: And the Dawn as it breathes away the darkness;-

malay: Sebenarnya Al-Quran itu, sungguh-sungguh Kalamullah (yang disampaikan oleh Jibril) Utusan yang mulia,
saheeh: [That] indeed, the Qur'an is a word [conveyed by] a noble messenger
yusufali: Verily this is the word of a most honourable Messenger,

malay: Yang kuat gagah, lagi berkedudukan tinggi di sisi Allah yang mempunyai Arasy,
saheeh: [Who is] possessed of power and with the Owner of the Throne, secure [in position],
yusufali: Endued with Power, with rank before the Lord of the Throne,

malay: Yang ditaati di sana (dalam kalangan malaikat), lagi dipercayai.
saheeh: Obeyed there [in the heavens] and trustworthy.
yusufali: With authority there, (and) faithful to his trust.

malay: Dan sebenarnya sahabat kamu (Nabi Muhammad) itu (wahai golongan yang menentang Islam), bukanlah ia seorang gila (seperti yang kamu tuduh);
saheeh: And your companion is not [at all] mad.
yusufali: And (O people!) your companion is not one possessed;

malay: Dan (Nabi Muhammad yakin bahawa yang disampaikan kepadanya ialah wahyu dari Tuhan, kerana) demi sesungguhnya! Nabi Muhammad telah mengenal dan melihat Jibril di kaki langit yang nyata.
saheeh: And he has already seen Gabriel in the clear horizon.
yusufali: And without doubt he saw him in the clear horizon.

malay: Dan bukanlah Nabi Muhammad seorang yang boleh dituduh dan disangka buruk, terhadap penyampaiannya mengenai perkara-perkara yang ghaib.
saheeh: And Muhammad is not a withholder of [knowledge of] the unseen.
yusufali: Neither doth he withhold grudgingly a knowledge of the Unseen.

malay: Dan sebenarnya Al-Quran itu bukanlah perkataan Syaitan yang kena rejam.
saheeh: And the Qur'an is not the word of a devil, expelled [from the heavens].
yusufali: Nor is it the word of an evil spirit accursed.

malay: (Dengan yang demikian) maka ke manakah kamu hendak pergi (kiranya kamu masih menyeleweng dari jalan Al-Quran)?
saheeh: So where are you going?
yusufali: When whither go ye?

malay: Al-Quran itu tidak lain hanyalah peringatan bagi seluruh penduduk alam:
saheeh: It is not except a reminder to the worlds
yusufali: Verily this is no less than a Message to (all) the Worlds:

malay: Iaitu bagi sesiapa dari kamu yang mahu tetap teguh di atas jalan (Islam) yang betul.
saheeh: For whoever wills among you to take a right course.
yusufali: (With profit) to whoever among you wills to go straight:

malay: Dan kamu tidak dapat menentukan kemahuan kamu (mengenai sesuatupun), kecuali dengan cara yang diatur oleh Allah, Tuhan yang memelihara dan mentadbirkan seluruh alam.
saheeh: And you do not will except that Allah wills - Lord of the worlds.
yusufali: But ye shall not will except as Allah wills,- the Cherisher of the Worlds.

malay: Apabila langit terbelah;
saheeh: When the sky breaks apart
yusufali: When the Sky is cleft asunder;

malay: Dan apabila bintang-bintang gugur bertaburan;
saheeh: And when the stars fall, scattering,
yusufali: When the Stars are scattered;

malay: Dan apabila lautan pecah bercampur-baur;
saheeh: And when the seas are erupted
yusufali: When the Oceans are suffered to burst forth;

malay: Dan apabila kubur-kubur dibongkarkan, -
saheeh: And when the [contents of] graves are scattered,
yusufali: And when the Graves are turned upside down;-

malay: (Setelah semuanya itu berlaku), tiap-tiap orang akan mengetahui apa yang telah dikerjakan dan ditinggalkannya.
saheeh: A soul will [then] know what it has put forth and kept back.
yusufali: (Then) shall each soul know what it hath sent forward and (what it hath) kept back.

malay: Wahai manusia! Apakah yang memperdayakanmu - (berlaku derhaka) kepada Tuhanmu yang Maha Pemurah? -
saheeh: O mankind, what has deceived you concerning your Lord, the Generous,
yusufali: O man! What has seduced thee from thy Lord Most Beneficent?-

malay: Tuhan yang telah mencipta dan mengatur kejadianmu, lalu menjadikan anggotamu sesuai (dengan tujuan yang kerananya anggota itu diadakan), serta menjadikan (binaan tubuh badanmu) sama padan dengan kekuatannya;
saheeh: Who created you, proportioned you, and balanced you?
yusufali: Him Who created thee. Fashioned thee in due proportion, and gave thee a just bias;

malay: Dalam bentuk dan rupa apa sahaja yang dikehendakiNya, Ia menyusun kejadianmu.
saheeh: In whatever form He willed has He assembled you.
yusufali: In whatever Form He wills, does He put thee together.

malay: Sebenarnya tidak ada yang memperdayakan kamu (hai golongan yang ingkar)! Bahkan kamu sendiri tidak percayakan adanya hari pembalasan.
saheeh: No! But you deny the Recompense.
yusufali: Nay! But ye do reject Right and Judgment!

malay: Padahal sesungguhnya, ada malaikat-malaikat yang menjaga dan mengawas segala bawaan kamu,
saheeh: And indeed, [appointed] over you are keepers,
yusufali: But verily over you (are appointed angels) to protect you,-

malay: (Mereka adalah makhluk) yang mulia (di sisi Allah), lagi ditugaskan menulis (amal-amal kamu);
saheeh: Noble and recording;
yusufali: Kind and honourable,- Writing down (your deeds):

malay: Mereka mengetahui apa yang kamu lakukan.
saheeh: They know whatever you do.
yusufali: They know (and understand) all that ye do.

malay: (Gunanya catitan malaikat-malaikat itu ialah: untuk menyatakan siapa yang berbakti dan siapa yang bersalah) - kerana sesungguhnya: orang-orang yang berbakti (dengan taat dan amal kebajikan), tetap berada dalam Syurga yang penuh nikmat;
saheeh: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure,
yusufali: As for the Righteous, they will be in bliss;

malay: Dan sesungguhnya orang-orang yang bersalah, bertempat dalam neraka yang menjulang-julang.
saheeh: And indeed, the wicked will be in Hellfire.
yusufali: And the Wicked - they will be in the Fire,

malay: Mereka menderita bakaran neraka itu pada hari pembalasan,
saheeh: They will [enter to] burn therein on the Day of Recompense,
yusufali: Which they will enter on the Day of Judgment,

malay: Dan mereka (sentiasa berada dalam azab seksanya), tidak ghaib daripadanya.
saheeh: And never therefrom will they be absent.
yusufali: And they will not be able to keep away therefrom.

malay: Dan apa jalannya engkau dapat mengetahui kedahsyatan hari pembalasan itu?
saheeh: And what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?
yusufali: And what will explain to thee what the Day of Judgment is?

malay: Sekali lagi, apa jalannya engkau dapat mengetahui kedahsyatan hari pembalasan itu?
saheeh: Then, what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?
yusufali: Again, what will explain to thee what the Day of Judgment is?

malay: (Hari itu ialah) hari seseorang tidak dapat memberikan pertolongan sedikitpun kepada orang lain, dan segala urusan pada hari itu tertentu bagi Allah.
saheeh: It is the Day when a soul will not possess for another soul [power to do] a thing; and the command, that Day, is [entirely] with Allah.
yusufali: (It will be) the Day when no soul shall have power (to do) aught for another: For the command, that Day, will be (wholly) with Allah.

malay: Kecelakaan besar bagi orang-orang yang curang (dalam timbangan dan sukatan),
saheeh: Woe to those who give less [than due],
yusufali: Woe to those that deal in fraud,-

malay: Iaitu mereka yang apabila menerima sukatan (gantang cupak) dari orang lain mereka mengambilnya dengan cukup,
saheeh: Who, when they take a measure from people, take in full.
yusufali: Those who, when they have to receive by measure from men, exact full measure,

malay: Dan (sebaliknya) apabila mereka menyukat atau menimbang untuk orang lain, mereka kurangi.
saheeh: But if they give by measure or by weight to them, they cause loss.
yusufali: But when they have to give by measure or weight to men, give less than due.

malay: Tidakkah mereka menyangka bahawa mereka akan dibangkitkan (hidup semula sesudah mati)?
saheeh: Do they not think that they will be resurrected
yusufali: Do they not think that they will be called to account?-

malay: Pada hari (kiamat) yang amat besar (huru-haranya),
saheeh: For a tremendous Day -
yusufali: On a Mighty Day,

malay: Hari berdiri manusia untuk mengadap Tuhan sekalian alam?
saheeh: The Day when mankind will stand before the Lord of the worlds?
yusufali: A Day when (all) mankind will stand before the Lord of the Worlds?

malay: Tidak sepatutnya (mereka melakukan perbuatan yang salah itu dan melalaikan hari akhirat)! Sesungguhnya "kitab suratan amal" orang-orang yang berdosa itu (didaftarkan) dalam "Sijjiin".
saheeh: No! Indeed, the record of the wicked is in sijjeen.
yusufali: Nay! Surely the record of the wicked is (preserved) in Sijjin.

malay: Dan apa jalannya engkau dapat mengetahui: apa dia "Sijjiin" itu,
saheeh: And what can make you know what is sijjeen?
yusufali: And what will explain to thee what Sijjin is?

malay: Ialah (tempat simpanan) kitab catitan yang jelas nyata, (yang menghimpunkan amalan orang-orang yang berdosa).
saheeh: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed.
yusufali: (There is) a Register (fully) inscribed.

malay: Kecelakaan besar, pada hari itu, bagi orang-orang yang mendustakan -
saheeh: Woe, that Day, to the deniers,
yusufali: Woe, that Day, to those that deny-

malay: Iaitu mereka yang mendustakan hari pembalasan.
saheeh: Who deny the Day of Recompense.
yusufali: Those that deny the Day of Judgment.

malay: Dan tiada yang mendustakannya melainkan tiap-tiap orang yang melampaui batas (kebenaran), lagi amat derhaka!
saheeh: And none deny it except every sinful transgressor.
yusufali: And none can deny it but the Transgressor beyond bounds the Sinner!

malay: (Sehingga) apabila ia dibacakan kepadanya ayat-ayat Kami, ia berkata:" Ini ialah dongeng orang-orang dahulu kala!"
saheeh: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."
yusufali: When Our Signs are rehearsed to him, he says, "Tales of the ancients!"

malay: Sebenarnya! (Ayat-ayat Kami itu tidak ada cacatnya) bahkan mata hati mereka telah diselaputi kekotoran (dosa), dengan sebab (perbuatan kufur dan maksiat) yang mereka kerjakan.
saheeh: No! Rather, the stain has covered their hearts of that which they were earning.
yusufali: By no means! but on their hearts is the stain of the (ill) which they do!

malay: Jangan lagi mereka berlaku demikian! (kalau tidak), mereka pada hari itu, tetap terdinding dari (rahmat) Tuhannya.
saheeh: No! Indeed, from their Lord, that Day, they will be partitioned.
yusufali: Verily, from (the Light of) their Lord, that Day, will they be veiled.

malay: Kemudian, sesungguhnya mereka akan menderita bakaran neraka.
saheeh: Then indeed, they will [enter and] burn in Hellfire.
yusufali: Further, they will enter the Fire of Hell.

malay: Akhirnya dikatakan (kepada mereka): "Inilah dia (azab seksa) yang kamu dustakan dahulu."
saheeh: Then it will be said [to them], "This is what you used to deny."
yusufali: Further, it will be said to them: "This is the (reality) which ye rejected as false!

malay: Ingatlah wahai manusia! Sesungguhnya "kitab suratan amal" orang-orang yang berbakti (dengan taat dan amal kebajikan), adalah (didaftarkan) dalam" Illiyiin".
saheeh: No! Indeed, the record of the righteous is in 'illiyyun.
yusufali: Nay, verily the record of the Righteous is (preserved) in 'Illiyin.

malay: Dan apa jalannya engkau dapat mengetahui, apa dia "Illiyiin" itu?
saheeh: And what can make you know what is 'illiyyun?
yusufali: And what will explain to thee what 'Illiyun is?

malay: Ialah (tempat simpanan) kitab catitan yang jelas nyata,
saheeh: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed
yusufali: (There is) a Register (fully) inscribed,

malay: Yang disaksikan oleh sekumpulan malaikat, yang didampingkan Tuhan di sisinya.
saheeh: Which is witnessed by those brought near [to Allah].
yusufali: To which bear witness those Nearest (to Allah).

malay: Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang berbakti (dengan taat dan amal kebajikan), tetap berada di dalam Syurga yang penuh nikmat:
saheeh: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure
yusufali: Truly the Righteous will be in Bliss:

malay: Mereka berehat di atas pelamin-pelamin (yang berhias), sambil melihat (segala keindahan dan kemuliaan yang disediakan untuk mereka di situ).
saheeh: On adorned couches, observing.
yusufali: On Thrones (of Dignity) will they command a sight (of all things):

malay: Engkau dapat melihat pada muka mereka: cahaya nikmat yang mereka perolehi.
saheeh: You will recognize in their faces the radiance of pleasure.
yusufali: Thou wilt recognise in their faces the beaming brightness of Bliss.

malay: Mereka diberi minum dari satu minuman yang termeterai bekasnya,
saheeh: They will be given to drink [pure] wine [which was] sealed.
yusufali: Their thirst will be slaked with Pure Wine sealed:

malay: Meterainya kasturi; - dan untuk (memperolehi nikmat kesenangan) itu hendaknya berlumba-lumba mereka yang ingin merebut kelebihan dan kesenangan;
saheeh: The last of it is musk. So for this let the competitors compete.
yusufali: The seal thereof will be Musk: And for this let those aspire, who have aspirations:

malay: Dan campuran minuman itu adalah dari "Tasnim":
saheeh: And its mixture is of Tasneem,
yusufali: With it will be (given) a mixture of Tasnim:

malay: laitu matair yang diminum daripadanya oleh orang-orang yang di dampingkan (Tuhan di sisiNya).
saheeh: A spring from which those near [to Allah] drink.
yusufali: A spring, from (the waters) whereof drink those Nearest to Allah.

malay: Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang derhaka, mereka selalu tertawakan orang-orang yang beriman.
saheeh: Indeed, those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed.
yusufali: Those in sin used to laugh at those who believed,

malay: Dan apabila orang-orang yang beriman lalu dekat mereka, mereka mengerling dan memejam celikkan mata sesama sendiri (mencemuhnya).
saheeh: And when they passed by them, they would exchange derisive glances.
yusufali: And whenever they passed by them, used to wink at each other (in mockery);

malay: Dan apabila mereka kembali kepada kaum keluarganya, mereka kembali dengan riang gembira;
saheeh: And when they returned to their people, they would return jesting.
yusufali: And when they returned to their own people, they would return jesting;

malay: Dan apabila mereka melihat orang-orang yang beriman, mereka berkata: "Sesungguhnya orang-orang itu adalah golongan yang sesat!"
saheeh: And when they saw them, they would say, "Indeed, those are truly lost."
yusufali: And whenever they saw them, they would say, "Behold! These are the people truly astray!"

malay: Pada hal mereka tidak diutus untuk menjaga sesat atau tidaknya orang-orang yang beriman itu!
saheeh: But they had not been sent as guardians over them.
yusufali: But they had not been sent as keepers over them!

malay: Maka pada hari ini, orang-orang yang beriman pula tertawakan orang yang kafir itu.
saheeh: So Today those who believed are laughing at the disbelievers,
yusufali: But on this Day the Believers will laugh at the Unbelievers:

malay: Sambil mereka berehat di atas pelamin-pelamin (yang berhias), serta melihat (hal yang berlaku kepada musuhnya).
saheeh: On adorned couches, observing.
yusufali: On Thrones (of Dignity) they will command (a sight) (of all things).

malay: (Untuk menambahkan kegembiraan mereka, mereka ditanya): "Bukankah orang-orang yang kafir itu telah dibalas akan apa yang mereka telah kerjakan dahulu?"
saheeh: Have the disbelievers [not] been rewarded [this Day] for what they used to do?
yusufali: Will not the Unbelievers have been paid back for what they did?

malay: Apabila langit terbelah,
saheeh: When the sky has split [open]
yusufali: When the sky is rent asunder,

malay: Serta mematuhi perintah Tuhannya, dan sudah semestinya ia patuh;
saheeh: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so]
yusufali: And hearkens to (the Command of) its Lord, and it must needs (do so);-

malay: Dan apabila bumi diratakan,
saheeh: And when the earth has been extended
yusufali: And when the earth is flattened out,

malay: Serta mengeluarkan apa yang di dalamnya, dan menjadi kosong,
saheeh: And has cast out that within it and relinquished [it]
yusufali: And casts forth what is within it and becomes (clean) empty,

malay: Serta mematuhi perintah Tuhannya, dan sudah semestinya ia patuh; - (Maka pada saat itu tiap-tiap seorang akan mengetahui apa yang telah dilakukannya).
saheeh: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so] -
yusufali: And hearkens to (the Command of) its Lord,- and it must needs (do so);- (then will come Home the full reality).

malay: Wahai manusia! Sesungguhnya engkau sentiasa berpenat-lelah (menjalankan keadaan hidupmu) dengan sedaya upayamu hinggalah (semasa engkau) kembali kepada Tuhanmu, kemudian engkau tetap menemui balasan apa yang engkau telah usahakan itu (tercatit semuanya).
saheeh: O mankind, indeed you are laboring toward your Lord with [great] exertion and will meet it.
yusufali: O thou man! Verily thou art ever toiling on towards thy Lord- painfully toiling,- but thou shalt meet Him.

malay: Kemudian sesiapa yang diberi menerima surat amalnya dengan tangan kanannya, -
saheeh: Then as for he who is given his record in his right hand,
yusufali: Then he who is given his Record in his right hand,

malay: Maka ia akan dihisab dengan cara yang mudah dan ringan,
saheeh: He will be judged with an easy account
yusufali: Soon will his account be taken by an easy reckoning,

malay: Dan ia akan pergi kepada keluarganya (yang beriman) dengan sukacita.
saheeh: And return to his people in happiness.
yusufali: And he will turn to his people, rejoicing!

malay: Dan sesiapa yang diberi menerima surat amalnya (dengan tangan kiri), dari sebelah belakangnya,
saheeh: But as for he who is given his record behind his back,
yusufali: But he who is given his Record behind his back,-

malay: Maka ia akan meraung menyebut-nyebut kebinasaannya,
saheeh: He will cry out for destruction
yusufali: Soon will he cry for perdition,

malay: Dan ia akan menderita bakaran neraka yang marak menjulang.
saheeh: And [enter to] burn in a Blaze.
yusufali: And he will enter a Blazing Fire.

malay: Sebenarnya ia semasa di dunia dahulu bersukaria dalam kalangan keluarganya (yang juga kufur ingkar)!
saheeh: Indeed, he had [once] been among his people in happiness;
yusufali: Truly, did he go about among his people, rejoicing!

malay: Sesungguhnya ia menyangka bahawa ia tidak sekali-kali akan kembali (kepada Kami untuk menerima balasan) !
saheeh: Indeed, he had thought he would never return [to Allah].
yusufali: Truly, did he think that he would not have to return (to Us)!

malay: (Sangkaannya itu tidak betul) bahkan ia tetap kembali! Sesungguhnya Tuhannya sentiasa Melihat dan Mengetahui keadaannya!
saheeh: But yes! Indeed, his Lord was ever of him, Seeing.
yusufali: Nay, nay! for his Lord was (ever) watchful of him!

malay: Maka Aku bersumpah, demi mega;
saheeh: So I swear by the twilight glow
yusufali: So I do call to witness the ruddy glow of Sunset;

malay: Dan malam serta segala yang dihimpunkannya;
saheeh: And [by] the night and what it envelops
yusufali: The Night and its Homing;

malay: Dan bulan apabila (penuh cahayanya) menjadi purnama:
saheeh: And [by] the moon when it becomes full
yusufali: And the Moon in her fullness:

malay: Sesungguhnya kamu tetap melalui beberapa keadaan yang bertingkat-tingkat baik buruknya, (sebelum kamu menemui Tuhan - menerima kesenangan dan kebahagiaan atau sebaliknya)
saheeh: [That] you will surely experience state after state.
yusufali: Ye shall surely travel from stage to stage.

malay: Maka apakah alasan bagi mereka bersikap tidak mahu beriman?
saheeh: So what is [the matter] with them [that] they do not believe,
yusufali: What then is the matter with them, that they believe not?-

malay: Dan (apakah pula alasannya) apabila dibacakan Al-Quran kepada mereka, mereka tidak mahu taat dan sujud?
saheeh: And when the Qur'an is recited to them, they do not prostrate [to Allah]?
yusufali: And when the Qur'an is read to them, they fall not prostrate,

malay: (Tidak ada satu alasan pun) bahkan orang-orang yang kafir, semata-mata mendustakannya;
saheeh: But those who have disbelieved deny,
yusufali: But on the contrary the Unbelievers reject (it).

malay: Sedang Allah mengetahui apa yang mereka rahsiakan dalam hati.
saheeh: And Allah is most knowing of what they keep within themselves.
yusufali: But Allah has full knowledge of what they secrete (in their breasts)

malay: Maka khabarkanlah kepada mereka dengan azab yang tidak terperi sakitnya;
saheeh: So give them tidings of a painful punishment,
yusufali: So announce to them a Penalty Grievous,

malay: Tetapi orang-orang yang beriman dan beramal soleh mereka beroleh pahala balasan yang tidak putus-putus.
saheeh: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds. For them is a reward uninterrupted.
yusufali: Except to those who believe and work righteous deeds: For them is a Reward that will never fail.

malay: Demi langit yang mempunyai tempat-tempat peredaran bintang-bintang;
saheeh: By the sky containing great stars
yusufali: By the sky, (displaying) the Zodiacal Signs;

malay: Dan hari (pembalasan) yang dijanjikan;
saheeh: And [by] the promised Day
yusufali: By the promised Day (of Judgment);

malay: Dan makhluk-makhluk yang hadir menyaksikan hari itu, serta segala keadaan yang disaksikan; -
saheeh: And [by] the witness and what is witnessed,
yusufali: By one that witnesses, and the subject of the witness;-

malay: Celakalah kaum yang menggali parit,
saheeh: Cursed were the companions of the trench
yusufali: Woe to the makers of the pit (of fire),

malay: (Parit) api yang penuh dengan bahan bakaran,
saheeh: [Containing] the fire full of fuel,
yusufali: Fire supplied (abundantly) with fuel:

malay: (Mereka dilaknat) ketika mereka duduk di kelilingnya,
saheeh: When they were sitting near it
yusufali: Behold! they sat over against the (fire),

malay: Sambil mereka melihat apa yang mereka lakukan kepada orang-orang yang beriman.
saheeh: And they, to what they were doing against the believers, were witnesses.
yusufali: And they witnessed (all) that they were doing against the Believers.

malay: Dan mereka tidak marah dan menyeksakan orang-orang yang beriman itu melainkan kerana orang-orang itu beriman kepada Allah Yang Maha Kuasa, lagi Maha Terpuji!
saheeh: And they resented them not except because they believed in Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy,
yusufali: And they ill-treated them for no other reason than that they believed in Allah, Exalted in Power, Worthy of all Praise!-

malay: Tuhan yang menguasai segala alam langit dan bumi. Dan (ingatlah), Allah sentiasa menyaksikan tiap-tiap sesuatu.
saheeh: To whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And Allah, over all things, is Witness.
yusufali: Him to Whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth! And Allah is Witness to all things.

malay: Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang menimpakan bencana untuk memesongkan orang-orang lelaki yang beriman dan orang-orang perempuan yang beriman, kemudian mereka tidak bertaubat, maka mereka akan beroleh azab neraka Jahannam (kerana perbuatan buruk itu), dan mereka akan beroleh lagi azab api yang kuat membakar (kerana mereka tidak bertaubat).
saheeh: Indeed, those who have tortured the believing men and believing women and then have not repented will have the punishment of Hell, and they will have the punishment of the Burning Fire.
yusufali: Those who persecute (or draw into temptation) the Believers, men and women, and do not turn in repentance, will have the Penalty of Hell: They will have the Penalty of the Burning Fire.

malay: Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang beriman dan beramal soleh, mereka akan beroleh Syurga yang mengalir di bawahnya beberapa sungai; yang demikian itu ialah kemenangan yang besar.
saheeh: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds will have gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the great attainment.
yusufali: For those who believe and do righteous deeds, will be Gardens; beneath which rivers flow: That is the great Salvation, (the fulfilment of all desires),

malay: Sesungguhnya azab Tuhanmu (terhadap orang-orang yang kufur ingkar) amatlah berat.
saheeh: Indeed, the vengeance of your Lord is severe.
yusufali: Truly strong is the Grip (and Power) of thy Lord.

malay: Sesungguhnya Dia lah yang menciptakan (sekalian makhluk) pada mulanya, dan yang mengembalikannya (hidup semula sesudah mati).
saheeh: Indeed, it is He who originates [creation] and repeats.
yusufali: It is He Who creates from the very beginning, and He can restore (life).

malay: Dan Dia lah yang Maha Pengampun, lagi Maha Pengasih.
saheeh: And He is the Forgiving, the Affectionate,
yusufali: And He is the Oft-Forgiving, Full of Loving-Kindness,

malay: Tuhan yang mempunyai Arasy yang tinggi kemuliaannya,
saheeh: Honorable Owner of the Throne,
yusufali: Lord of the Throne of Glory,

malay: Yang berkuasa melakukan segala yang dikehendakinya.
saheeh: Effecter of what He intends.
yusufali: Doer (without let) of all that He intends.

malay: Sudahkah sampai kepadamu (wahai Muhammad) perihal (kebinasaan yang telah menimpa) kaum-kaum yang menentang (Rasul-rasul yang diutuskan kepada mereka)?
saheeh: Has there reached you the story of the soldiers -
yusufali: Has the story reached thee, of the forces-

malay: (Mereka itu ialah kaum) Firaun, dan Thamud (kaum Nabi Soleh).
saheeh: [Those of] Pharaoh and Thamud?
yusufali: Of Pharaoh and the Thamud?

malay: (Kaummu wahai Muhammad, bukan sahaja menolak ajaranmu), bahkan orang-orang yang kafir itu terus tenggelam dalam keadaan mendustakan kebenaran;
saheeh: But they who disbelieve are in [persistent] denial,
yusufali: And yet the Unbelievers (persist) in rejecting (the Truth)!

malay: Sedang Allah, dari belakang mereka, melingkungi mereka (dengan kekuasaanNya)!
saheeh: While Allah encompasses them from behind.
yusufali: But Allah doth encompass them from behind!

malay: (Sebenarnya apa yang engkau sampaikan kepada mereka bukanlah syair atau sihir), bahkan ialah Al-Quran yang tertinggi kemuliaannya;
saheeh: But this is an honored Qur'an
yusufali: Nay, this is a Glorious Qur'an,

malay: (Lagi yang terpelihara dengan sebaik-baiknya) pada Lauh Mahfuz.
saheeh: [Inscribed] in a Preserved Slate.
yusufali: (Inscribed) in a Tablet Preserved!

malay: Demi langit dan "At-Taariq"; -
saheeh: By the sky and the night comer -
yusufali: By the Sky and the Night-Visitant (therein);-

malay: Dan apa jalannya engkau dapat mengetahui apa dia "At-Taariq" itu? -
saheeh: And what can make you know what is the night comer?
yusufali: And what will explain to thee what the Night-Visitant is?-

malay: (At-Taariq) ialah bintang yang menembusi (sinaran cahayanya);
saheeh: It is the piercing star -
yusufali: (It is) the Star of piercing brightness;-

malay: Tiada sesuatu diri juapun melainkan ada malaikat yang menjaga (keadaannya serta menyimpan catitan mengenai segala bawaannya).
saheeh: There is no soul but that it has over it a protector.
yusufali: There is no soul but has a protector over it.

malay: (Setelah mengetahui yang demikian), maka hendaklah manusia memikirkan: dari apa ia diciptakan.
saheeh: So let man observe from what he was created.
yusufali: Now let man but think from what he is created!

malay: Ia diciptakan dari air (mani) yang memancut (ke dalam rahim) -
saheeh: He was created from a fluid, ejected,
yusufali: He is created from a drop emitted-

malay: Yang keluar dari "tulang sulbi" lelaki dan "tulang dada" perempuan.
saheeh: Emerging from between the backbone and the ribs.
yusufali: Proceeding from between the backbone and the ribs:

malay: Sesungguhnya Allah Maha Kuasa untuk mengembalikannya (hidup semula sesudah mati),
saheeh: Indeed, Allah, to return him [to life], is Able.
yusufali: Surely (Allah) is able to bring him back (to life)!

malay: Pada hari didedahkan segala yang terpendam di hati (dari iktiqad, niat, dan lain-lainnya),
saheeh: The Day when secrets will be put on trial,
yusufali: The Day that (all) things secret will be tested,

malay: Maka (pada saat itu) tidak ada bagi manusia sebarang kekuatan (untuk membela diri), dan tidak ada penolong (yang dapat memberikan pertolongan).
saheeh: Then man will have no power or any helper.
yusufali: (Man) will have no power, and no helper.

malay: Demi langit yang berulang-ulang mencurahkan hujan,
saheeh: By the sky which returns [rain]
yusufali: By the Firmament which returns (in its round),

malay: Dan bumi yang merekah mengeluarkan tumbuh-tumbuhan,
saheeh: And [by] the earth which cracks open,
yusufali: And by the Earth which opens out (for the gushing of springs or the sprouting of vegetation),-

malay: Sesungguhnya keterangan Al-Quran adalah kata-kata pemutus (yang sebenar),
saheeh: Indeed, the Qur'an is a decisive statement,
yusufali: Behold this is the Word that distinguishes (Good from Evil):

malay: Dan bukanlah ia kata-kata yang olok-olok.
saheeh: And it is not amusement.
yusufali: It is not a thing for amusement.

malay: Sesungguhnya mereka (yang menentangmu, wahai Muhammad) bermati-mati menjalankan rancangan jahat,
saheeh: Indeed, they are planning a plan,
yusufali: As for them, they are but plotting a scheme,

malay: Dan Aku pula tetap bertindak membalas rancangan jahat (mereka, dan menggagalkannya).
saheeh: But I am planning a plan.
yusufali: And I am planning a scheme.

malay: Oleh itu janganlah engkau hendakkan segera kebinasaan orang-orang kafir itu, berilah tempoh kepada mereka sedikit masa.
saheeh: So allow time for the disbelievers. Leave them awhile.
yusufali: Therefore grant a delay to the Unbelievers: Give respite to them gently (for awhile).

malay: Bertasbihlah mensucikan nama Tuhanmu Yang Maha Tinggi (dari segala sifat-sifat kekurangan), -
saheeh: Exalt the name of your Lord, the Most High,
yusufali: Glorify the name of thy Guardian-Lord Most High,

malay: Yang telah menciptakan (sekalian makhlukNya) serta menyempurnakan kejadiannya dengan kelengkapan yang sesuai dengan keadaannya;
saheeh: Who created and proportioned
yusufali: Who hath created, and further, given order and proportion;

malay: Dan Yang telah mengatur (keadaan makhluk-makhlukNya) serta memberikan hidayah petunjuk (ke jalan keselamatannya dan kesempurnaannya);
saheeh: And who destined and [then] guided
yusufali: Who hath ordained laws. And granted guidance;

malay: Dan Yang telah mengeluarkan tumbuh-tumbuhan untuk binatang-binatang ternak,
saheeh: And who brings out the pasture
yusufali: And Who bringeth out the (green and luscious) pasture,

malay: Kemudian Ia menjadikan (tumbuh-tumbuhan yang menghijau) itu kering - (berubah warnanya) kehitam-hitaman.
saheeh: And [then] makes it black stubble.
yusufali: And then doth make it (but) swarthy stubble.

malay: Kami sentiasa menjadikan engkau (wahai Muhammad) dapat membaca (Al-Quran yang diturunkan kepadamu - dengan perantaraan jibril), sehingga engkau (menghafaznya dan) tidak lupa,
saheeh: We will make you recite, [O Muhammad], and you will not forget,
yusufali: By degrees shall We teach thee to declare (the Message), so thou shalt not forget,

malay: Kecuali apa yang dikehendaki Allah engkau lupakan; sesungguhnya Ia mengetahui (segala keadaan yang patut berlaku), dan yang tersembunyi.
saheeh: Except what Allah should will. Indeed, He knows what is declared and what is hidden.
yusufali: Except as Allah wills: For He knoweth what is manifest and what is hidden.

malay: Dan Kami tetap memberi kemudahan kepadamu untuk (melaksanakan segala perkara) Agama yang mudah diterima oleh akal yang sihat.
saheeh: And We will ease you toward ease.
yusufali: And We will make it easy for thee (to follow) the simple (Path).

malay: Oleh itu berilah peringatan (kepada umat manusia dengan ajaran Al-Quran), kalau-kalau peringatan itu berguna (dan sudah tentu berguna);
saheeh: So remind, if the reminder should benefit;
yusufali: Therefore give admonition in case the admonition profits (the hearer).

malay: Kerana orang yang takut (melanggar perintah Allah) akan menerima peringatan itu;
saheeh: He who fears [Allah] will be reminded.
yusufali: The admonition will be received by those who fear (Allah):

malay: Dan (sebaliknya) orang yang sangat celaka akan menjauhinya,
saheeh: But the wretched one will avoid it -
yusufali: But it will be avoided by those most unfortunate ones,

malay: Dia lah orang yang akan menderita bakaran neraka yang amat besar (azab seksanya),
saheeh: [He] who will [enter and] burn in the greatest Fire,
yusufali: Who will enter the Great Fire,

malay: Selain dari itu, ia tidak mati di dalamnya dan tidak pula hidup senang.
saheeh: Neither dying therein nor living.
yusufali: In which they will then neither die nor live.

malay: Sesungguhnya berjayalah orang yang - setelah menerima peringatan itu - berusaha membersihkan dirinya (dengan taat dan amal yang soleh),
saheeh: He has certainly succeeded who purifies himself
yusufali: But those will prosper who purify themselves,

malay: Dan menyebut-nyebut dengan lidah dan hatinya akan nama Tuhannya serta mangerjakan sembahyang (dengan khusyuk).
saheeh: And mentions the name of his Lord and prays.
yusufali: And glorify the name of their Guardian-Lord, and (lift their hearts) in prayer.

malay: (Tetapi kebanyakkan kamu tidak melakukan yang demikian), bahkan kamu utamakan kehidupan dunia;
saheeh: But you prefer the worldly life,
yusufali: Nay (behold), ye prefer the life of this world;

malay: Padahal kehidupan akhirat lebih baik dan lebih kekal.
saheeh: While the Hereafter is better and more enduring.
yusufali: But the Hereafter is better and more enduring.

malay: Sesungguhnya (keterangan-keterangan yang dinyatakan) ini ada (disebutkan) di dalam Kitab-kitab yang terdahulu, -
saheeh: Indeed, this is in the former scriptures,
yusufali: And this is in the Books of the earliest (Revelation),-

malay: Iaitu Kitab-kitab Nabi Ibrahim dan Nabi Musa.
saheeh: The scriptures of Abraham and Moses.
yusufali: The Books of Abraham and Moses.

malay: Sudahkah sampai kepadamu (wahai Muhammad) perihal hari kiamat yang huru-haranya meliputi?
saheeh: Has there reached you the report of the Overwhelming [event]?
yusufali: Has the story reached thee of the overwhelming (Event)?

malay: Muka (orang-orang yang kafir) pada hari itu tunduk kerana merasa hina,
saheeh: [Some] faces, that Day, will be humbled,
yusufali: Some faces, that Day, will be humiliated,

malay: Mereka menjalankan kerja yang berat lagi berpenat lelah,
saheeh: Working [hard] and exhausted.
yusufali: Labouring (hard), weary,-

malay: Mereka tetap menderita bakaran neraka yang amat panas (membakar), -
saheeh: They will [enter to] burn in an intensely hot Fire.
yusufali: The while they enter the Blazing Fire,-

malay: Mereka diberi minum dari matair yang menggelegak panasnya.
saheeh: They will be given drink from a boiling spring.
yusufali: The while they are given, to drink, of a boiling hot spring,

malay: Tiada makanan bagi mereka (di situ) selain dari pokok-pokok yang berduri,
saheeh: For them there will be no food except from a poisonous, thorny plant
yusufali: No food will there be for them but a bitter Dhari'

malay: Yang tidak menggemokkan, dan tidak pula dapat menghilangkan sedikit kelaparan pun.
saheeh: Which neither nourishes nor avails against hunger.
yusufali: Which will neither nourish nor satisfy hunger.

malay: (Sebaliknya) muka (orang-orang yang beriman) pada hari itu berseri-seri,
saheeh: [Other] faces, that Day, will show pleasure.
yusufali: (Other) faces that Day will be joyful,

malay: Berpuas hati dengan balasan amal usahanya (yang baik yang telah dikerjakannya di dunia), -
saheeh: With their effort [they are] satisfied
yusufali: Pleased with their striving,-

malay: (Mereka tinggal menetap) di dalam Syurga tinggi (tempat kedudukannya darjatnya),
saheeh: In an elevated garden,
yusufali: In a Garden on high,

malay: Mereka tidak mendengar di situ sebarang perkataan yang sia-sia,
saheeh: Wherein they will hear no unsuitable speech.
yusufali: Where they shall hear no (word) of vanity:

malay: Di dalam Syurga itu ada matair yang mengalir,
saheeh: Within it is a flowing spring.
yusufali: Therein will be a bubbling spring:

malay: Di situ juga ada pelamin-pelamin (berhias) yang tinggi (tempatnya),
saheeh: Within it are couches raised high
yusufali: Therein will be Thrones (of dignity), raised on high,

malay: Dan piala-piala minuman yang disediakan (untuk mereka),
saheeh: And cups put in place
yusufali: Goblets placed (ready),

malay: Dan bantal-bantal yang teratur (untuk mereka berbaring atau bersandar),
saheeh: And cushions lined up
yusufali: And cushions set in rows,

malay: Serta hamparan-hamparan yang terbentang.
saheeh: And carpets spread around.
yusufali: And rich carpets (all) spread out.

malay: (Mengapa mereka yang kafir masih mengingkari akhirat) tidakkah mereka memperhatikan keadaan unta bagaimana ia diciptakan?
saheeh: Then do they not look at the camels - how they are created?
yusufali: Do they not look at the Camels, how they are made?-

malay: Dan keadaan langit bagaimana ia ditinggikan binaannya.?
saheeh: And at the sky - how it is raised?
yusufali: And at the Sky, how it is raised high?-

malay: Dan keadaan gunung-ganang bagaimana ia ditegakkan?
saheeh: And at the mountains - how they are erected?
yusufali: And at the Mountains, how they are fixed firm?-

malay: Dan keadaan bumi bagaimana ia dihamparkan?
saheeh: And at the earth - how it is spread out?
yusufali: And at the Earth, how it is spread out?

malay: Oleh itu berikanlah sahaja peringatan (wahai Muhammad, kepada manusia, dan janganlah berdukacita kiranya ada yang menolaknya), kerana sesungguhnya engkau hanyalah seorang Rasul pemberi ingatan;
saheeh: So remind, [O Muhammad]; you are only a reminder.
yusufali: Therefore do thou give admonition, for thou art one to admonish.

malay: Bukanlah engkau seorang yang berkuasa memaksa mereka (menerima ajaran Islam yang engkau sampaikan itu).
saheeh: You are not over them a controller.
yusufali: Thou art not one to manage (men's) affairs.

malay: Akan tetapi sesiapa yang berpaling (dari kebenaran) serta ia kufur ingkar, -
saheeh: However, he who turns away and disbelieves -
yusufali: But if any turn away and reject Allah,-

malay: Maka Allah akan menyeksanya dengan azab seksa yang sebesar-besarnya.
saheeh: Then Allah will punish him with the greatest punishment.
yusufali: Allah will punish him with a mighty Punishment,

malay: Sesungguhnya kepada Kamilah kembalinya mereka,
saheeh: Indeed, to Us is their return.
yusufali: For to Us will be their return;

malay: Selain dari itu, sesungguhnya tanggungan Kamilah soal menghitung amal mereka.
saheeh: Then indeed, upon Us is their account.
yusufali: Then it will be for Us to call them to account.

malay: Demi waktu fajar;
saheeh: By the dawn
yusufali: By the break of Day

malay: Dan malam yang sepuluh (yang mempunyai kelebihan di sisi Allah);
saheeh: And [by] ten nights
yusufali: By the Nights twice five;

malay: Dan bilangan yang genap serta yang ganjil;
saheeh: And [by] the even [number] and the odd
yusufali: By the even and odd (contrasted);

malay: Dan malam, apabila ia berlalu; -
saheeh: And [by] the night when it passes,
yusufali: And by the Night when it passeth away;-

malay: Bukankah yang demikian itu mengandungi sumpah (yang diakui kebenarannya) oleh orang yang berakal sempurna?
saheeh: Is there [not] in [all] that an oath [sufficient] for one of perception?
yusufali: Is there (not) in these an adjuration (or evidence) for those who understand?

malay: (Kami tetap akan membinasakan orang-orang yang menentangmu wahai Muhammad), tidakkah engkau perhatikan, bagaimana Tuhanmu telah melakukan terhadap kaum Aad (yang kufur derhaka)
saheeh: Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with 'Aad -
yusufali: Seest thou not how thy Lord dealt with the 'Ad (people),-

malay: Iaitu penduduk "Iram" yang mempunyai bangunan-bangunan yang tinggi tiangnya, (sesuai dengan penduduknya)
saheeh: [With] Iram - who had lofty pillars,
yusufali: Of the (city of) Iram, with lofty pillars,

malay: Yang belum pernah diciptakan sepertinya (tentang besar dan kukuhnya) di segala negeri (pada zamannya)?
saheeh: The likes of whom had never been created in the land?
yusufali: The like of which were not produced in (all) the land?

malay: Dan (terhadap) kaum Thamud yang memahat batu-batu besar di lembah (Wadil-Qura iaitu tempat tinggalnya)?
saheeh: And [with] Thamud, who carved out the rocks in the valley?
yusufali: And with the Thamud (people), who cut out (huge) rocks in the valley?-

malay: Dan (terhadap) Firaun yang menguasai bangunan-bangunan yang handal kukuh?
saheeh: And [with] Pharaoh, owner of the stakes? -
yusufali: And with Pharaoh, lord of stakes?

malay: (Semuanya itu ialah) orang-orang yang telah bermaharajalela di negeri (masing-masing).
saheeh: [All of] whom oppressed within the lands
yusufali: (All) these transgressed beyond bounds in the lands,

malay: Lalu mereka melakukan dengan banyaknya kerosakan dan bencana di negeri-negeri itu.
saheeh: And increased therein the corruption.
yusufali: And heaped therein mischief (on mischief).

malay: Dengan yang demikian, Tuhanmu mencurahkan ke atas mereka berbagai paluan azab;
saheeh: So your Lord poured upon them a scourge of punishment.
yusufali: Therefore did thy Lord pour on them a scourge of diverse chastisements:

malay: Sesungguhnya Tuhanmu tetap mengawas dan membalas, (terutama balasan akhirat)
saheeh: Indeed, your Lord is in observation.
yusufali: For thy Lord is (as a Guardian) on a watch-tower.

malay: (Dalam pada itu manusia tidak menghiraukan balasan akhirat), oleh yang demikian, maka kebanyakan manusia apabila diuji oleh Tuhannya dengan dimuliakan dan dimewahkan hidupnya, (ia tidak mahu bersyukur tetapi terus bersikap takbur) serta berkata dengan sombongnya: "Tuhanku telah memuliakan daku!"
saheeh: And as for man, when his Lord tries him and [thus] is generous to him and favors him, he says, "My Lord has honored me."
yusufali: Now, as for man, when his Lord trieth him, giving him honour and gifts, then saith he, (puffed up), "My Lord hath honoured me."

malay: Dan sebaliknya apabila ia diuji oleh Tuhannya, dengan disempitkan rezekinya, (ia tidak bersabar bahkan ia resah gelisah) serta merepek dengan katanya: "Tuhanku telah menghinakan daku!"
saheeh: But when He tries him and restricts his provision, he says, "My Lord has humiliated me."
yusufali: But when He trieth him, restricting his subsistence for him, then saith he (in despair), "My Lord hath humiliated me!"

malay: Jangan demikian, (sebenarnya kata-kata kamu itu salah). Bahkan (perbuatan kamu wahai orang-orang yang hidup mewah, lebih salah lagi kerana) kamu tidak memuliakan anak yatim, (malah kamu menahan apa yang Ia berhak menerimanya);
saheeh: No! But you do not honor the orphan
yusufali: Nay, nay! but ye honour not the orphans!

malay: Dan kamu tidak menggalakkan untuk memberi makanan (yang berhak diterima oleh) orang miskin;
saheeh: And you do not encourage one another to feed the poor.
yusufali: Nor do ye encourage one another to feed the poor!-

malay: Dan kamu sentiasa makan harta pusaka secara rakus (dengan tidak membezakan halal haramnya),
saheeh: And you consume inheritance, devouring [it] altogether,
yusufali: And ye devour inheritance - all with greed,

malay: Serta kamu pula sayangkan harta secara tamak haloba!
saheeh: And you love wealth with immense love.
yusufali: And ye love wealth with inordinate love!

malay: Jangan sekali-kali bersikap demikian! (Sebenarnya) apabila bumi (dihancurkan segala yang ada di atasnya dan) diratakan serata-ratanya,
saheeh: No! When the earth has been leveled - pounded and crushed -
yusufali: Nay! When the earth is pounded to powder,

malay: Dan (perintah) Tuhanmu pun datang, sedang malaikat berbaris-baris (siap sedia menjalankan perintah),
saheeh: And your Lord has come and the angels, rank upon rank,
yusufali: And thy Lord cometh, and His angels, rank upon rank,

malay: Serta diperlihatkan neraka Jahannam pada hari itu, (maka) pada saat itu manusia akan ingat (hendak berlaku baik), dan bagaimana ingatan itu akan berguna lagi kepadanya?
saheeh: And brought [within view], that Day, is Hell - that Day, man will remember, but what good to him will be the remembrance?
yusufali: And Hell, that Day, is brought (face to face),- on that Day will man remember, but how will that remembrance profit him?

malay: Ia akan berkata: "Alangkah baiknya kalau aku dahulu sediakan amal-amal baik untuk hidupku (di sini)!"
saheeh: He will say, "Oh, I wish I had sent ahead [some good] for my life."
yusufali: He will say: "Ah! Would that I had sent forth (good deeds) for (this) my (Future) Life!"

malay: Maka pada hari itu tiada sesiapapun yang dapat menyeksa seperti azab (yang ditimpakan oleh) Allah.
saheeh: So on that Day, none will punish [as severely] as His punishment,
yusufali: For, that Day, His Chastisement will be such as none (else) can inflict,

malay: Dan tiada sesiapapun yang dapat mengikat serta membelenggu seperti ikatan dan belengguNya.
saheeh: And none will bind [as severely] as His binding [of the evildoers].
yusufali: And His bonds will be such as none (other) can bind.

malay: (Setelah menerangkan akibat orang-orang yang tidak menghiraukan akhirat, Tuhan menyatakan bahawa orang-orang yang beriman dan beramal soleh akan disambut dengan kata-kata): "Wahai orang yang mempunyai jiwa yang sentiasa tenang tetap dengan kepercayaan dan bawaan baiknya! -
saheeh: [To the righteous it will be said], "O reassured soul,
yusufali: (To the righteous soul will be said:) "O (thou) soul, in (complete) rest and satisfaction!

malay: "Kembalilah kepada Tuhanmu dengan keadaan engkau berpuas hati (dengan segala nikmat yang diberikan) lagi diredhai (di sisi Tuhanmu) ! -
saheeh: Return to your Lord, well-pleased and pleasing [to Him],
yusufali: "Come back thou to thy Lord,- well pleased (thyself), and well-pleasing unto Him!

malay: "Serta masuklah engkau dalam kumpulan hamba-hambaku yang berbahagia -
saheeh: And enter among My [righteous] servants
yusufali: "Enter thou, then, among My devotees!

malay: "Dan masuklah ke dalam SyurgaKu! "
saheeh: And enter My Paradise."
yusufali: "Yea, enter thou My Heaven!

malay: Aku bersumpah dengan negeri (Makkah) ini;
saheeh: I swear by this city, Makkah -
yusufali: I do call to witness this City;-

malay: Sedang engkau (wahai Muhammad) tinggal di negeri ini (sentiasa ditindas),
saheeh: And you, [O Muhammad], are free of restriction in this city -
yusufali: And thou art a freeman of this City;-

malay: Demi manusia yang melahirkan zuriat, dan zuriat yang dilahirkannya;
saheeh: And [by] the father and that which was born [of him],
yusufali: And (the mystic ties of) parent and child;-

malay: Sesungguhnya Kami telah jadikan manusia sentiasa dalam keadaan menghadapi kesulitan dan kesukaran (jasmani dan rohaninya);
saheeh: We have certainly created man into hardship.
yusufali: Verily We have created man into toil and struggle.

malay: Patutkah manusia yang demikian keadaannya (terpedaya dengan kekuasaan yang ada padanya dan) menyangka bahawa tidak ada sesiapapun yang dapat mengatasi kekuasaannya (dan menyeksakannya)?
saheeh: Does he think that never will anyone overcome him?
yusufali: Thinketh he, that none hath power over him?

malay: Manusia yang demikian keadaannya (tidaklah patut ia bermegah-megah dengan kekayaannya dan) berkata: "Aku telah habiskan harta benda yang banyak (dalam usaha menegakkan nama dan bangsa).
saheeh: He says, "I have spent wealth in abundance."
yusufali: He may say (boastfully); Wealth have I squandered in abundance!

malay: Adakah ia menyangka bahawa tidak ada sesiapapun yang melihatnya (dan mengetahui tujuannya menghabiskan harta bendanya itu?
saheeh: Does he think that no one has seen him?
yusufali: Thinketh he that none beholdeth him?

malay: (Mengapa manusia terpedaya dan bermegah-megah?) Tidakkah Kami telah menjadikan baginya: dua mata (untuk ia memerhatikan kekuasaan dan kekayaan Kami?) -
saheeh: Have We not made for him two eyes?
yusufali: Have We not made for him a pair of eyes?-

malay: Dan lidah serta dua bibir (untuk ia menyempurnakan sebahagian besar dari hajat-hajatnya)?
saheeh: And a tongue and two lips?
yusufali: And a tongue, and a pair of lips?-

malay: Dan Kami telah menunjukkan kepadanya dua jalan, (jalan kebaikan untuk dijalaninya, dan jalan kejahatan untuk dijauhi)?
saheeh: And have shown him the two ways?
yusufali: And shown him the two highways?

malay: Dalam pada itu manusia tidak (memilih jalan kebaikan) merempuh masuk mengerjakan amal-amal yang tinggi darjatnya di sisi Tuhan;
saheeh: But he has not broken through the difficult pass.
yusufali: But he hath made no haste on the path that is steep.

malay: Dan apa jalannya engkau dapat mengetahui: apa dia amal-amal yang tinggi darjatnya di sisi Tuhan itu?
saheeh: And what can make you know what is [breaking through] the difficult pass?
yusufali: And what will explain to thee the path that is steep?-

malay: (Di antara amal-amal itu - bagi orang yang mampu) ialah: memerdekakan hamba abdi;
saheeh: It is the freeing of a slave
yusufali: (It is:) freeing the bondman;

malay: Atau memberi makan pada hari kelaparan -
saheeh: Or feeding on a day of severe hunger
yusufali: Or the giving of food in a day of privation

malay: Kepada anak yatim dari kaum kerabat,
saheeh: An orphan of near relationship
yusufali: To the orphan with claims of relationship,

malay: Atau kepada orang miskin yang terlantar di atas tanah.
saheeh: Or a needy person in misery
yusufali: Or to the indigent (down) in the dust.

malay: Selain dari (tidak mengerjakan amal-amal) itu, ia (tidak pula) menjadi dari orang-orang yang beriman dan berpesan-pesan dengan sabar serta berpesan-pesan dengan kasih sayang.
saheeh: And then being among those who believed and advised one another to patience and advised one another to compassion.
yusufali: Then will he be of those who believe, and enjoin patience, (constancy, and self-restraint), and enjoin deeds of kindness and compassion.

malay: (Ketahuilah! Bahawa orang-orang yang beriman serta berusaha mengerjakan amal-amal yang tinggi darjatnya di sisi Tuhan), merekalah golongan pihak kanan (yang akan beroleh Syurga).
saheeh: Those are the companions of the right.
yusufali: Such are the Companions of the Right Hand.

malay: Dan (sebaliknya) orang-orang yang kufur ingkar akan ayat-ayat keterangan Kami, merekalah golongan pihak kiri. -
saheeh: But they who disbelieved in Our signs - those are the companions of the left.
yusufali: But those who reject Our Signs, they are the (unhappy) Companions of the Left Hand.

malay: Mereka ditimpakan (azab seksa) neraka yang ditutup rapat (supaya kuat bakarannya).
saheeh: Over them will be fire closed in.
yusufali: On them will be Fire vaulted over (all round).

malay: Demi matahari dan cahayanya yang terang-benderang;
saheeh: By the sun and its brightness
yusufali: By the Sun and his (glorious) splendour;

malay: Dan bulan apabila ia mengiringinya;
saheeh: And [by] the moon when it follows it
yusufali: By the Moon as she follows him;

malay: Dan siang apabila ia memperlihatkannya dengan jelas nyata;
saheeh: And [by] the day when it displays it
yusufali: By the Day as it shows up (the Sun's) glory;

malay: Dan malam apabila ia menyelubunginya (dengan gelap- gelita),
saheeh: And [by] the night when it covers it
yusufali: By the Night as it conceals it;

malay: Demi langit dan Yang membinanya (dalam bentuk yang kuat kukuh - yang melambangkan kekuasaanNya);
saheeh: And [by] the sky and He who constructed it
yusufali: By the Firmament and its (wonderful) structure;

malay: Serta bumi dan Yang menghamparkannya (untuk kemudahan makhluk-makhlukNya);
saheeh: And [by] the earth and He who spread it
yusufali: By the Earth and its (wide) expanse:

malay: Demi diri manusia dan Yang menyempurnakan kejadiannya (dengan kelengkapan yang sesuai dengan keadaannya);
saheeh: And [by] the soul and He who proportioned it
yusufali: By the Soul, and the proportion and order given to it;

malay: Serta mengilhamkannya (untuk mengenal) jalan yang membawanya kepada kejahatan, dan yang membawanya kepada bertaqwa; -
saheeh: And inspired it [with discernment of] its wickedness and its righteousness,
yusufali: And its enlightenment as to its wrong and its right;-

malay: Sesungguhnya berjayalah orang yang menjadikan dirinya - yang sedia bersih - bertambah-tambah bersih (dengan iman dan amal kebajikan),
saheeh: He has succeeded who purifies it,
yusufali: Truly he succeeds that purifies it,

malay: Dan sesungguhnya hampalah orang yang menjadikan dirinya - yang sedia bersih - itu susut dan terbenam kebersihannya (dengan sebab kekotoran maksiat).
saheeh: And he has failed who instills it [with corruption].
yusufali: And he fails that corrupts it!

malay: (Ingatlah), kaum Thamud telah mendustakan (Rasulnya) dengan sebab perbuatan derhaka mereka yang melampaui batas;
saheeh: Thamud denied [their prophet] by reason of their transgression,
yusufali: The Thamud (people) rejected (their prophet) through their inordinate wrong-doing,

malay: Ketika orang yang paling jahat di antara mereka menerima perintah dari mereka (supaya membunuh unta yang menjadi mukjizat),
saheeh: When the most wretched of them was sent forth.
yusufali: Behold, the most wicked man among them was deputed (for impiety).

malay: Maka berkatalah Rasul Allah (Nabi Soleh) kepada mereka: " (Janganlah kamu ganggu) unta betina dari Allah itu, dan (janganlah kamu menyekatnya daripada mendapat) air minumnya (supaya kamu tidak ditimpa azab)!"
saheeh: And the messenger of Allah [Salih] said to them, "[Do not harm] the she-camel of Allah or [prevent her from] her drink."
yusufali: But the Messenger of Allah said to them: "It is a She-camel of Allah! And (bar her not from) having her drink!"

malay: (Setelah Nabi Soleh memberi amaran) lalu mereka mendustakannya serta menyembelih unta itu. Dengan sebab dosa mereka, maka Tuhan menimpakan mereka dengan azab yang membinasakan serta Ia meratakan azab itu meliputi mereka (sehingga punah-ranah semuanya).
saheeh: But they denied him and hamstrung her. So their Lord brought down upon them destruction for their sin and made it equal [upon all of them].
yusufali: Then they rejected him (as a false prophet), and they hamstrung her. So their Lord, on account of their crime, obliterated their traces and made them equal (in destruction, high and low)!

malay: Dan Allah tidak hiraukan kesudahan (mereka) yang demikian, (kerana itu adalah balasan yang adil).
saheeh: And He does not fear the consequence thereof.
yusufali: And for Him is no fear of its consequences.

malay: Demi malam apabila ia menyelubungi segala-galanya (dengan gelap-gelitanya),
saheeh: By the night when it covers
yusufali: By the Night as it conceals (the light);

malay: Dan siang apabila ia lahir terang-benderang;
saheeh: And [by] the day when it appears
yusufali: By the Day as it appears in glory;

malay: Demi Yang menciptakan (makhluk-makhlukNya) lelaki dan perempuan, (jantan dan betina); -
saheeh: And [by] He who created the male and female,
yusufali: By (the mystery of) the creation of male and female;-

malay: Sesungguhnya amal usaha kamu adalah berbagai-bagai keadaannya.
saheeh: Indeed, your efforts are diverse.
yusufali: Verily, (the ends) ye strive for are diverse.

malay: Jelasnya: adapun orang yang memberikan apa yang ada padanya ke jalan kebaikan dan bertaqwa (mengerjakan suruhan Allah dan meninggalkan segala laranganNya), -
saheeh: As for he who gives and fears Allah
yusufali: So he who gives (in charity) and fears (Allah),

malay: Serta ia mengakui dengan yakin akan perkara yang baik,
saheeh: And believes in the best [reward],
yusufali: And (in all sincerity) testifies to the best,-

malay: Maka sesungguhnya Kami akan memberikannya kemudahan untuk mendapat kesenangan (Syurga).
saheeh: We will ease him toward ease.
yusufali: We will indeed make smooth for him the path to Bliss.

malay: Sebaliknya: orang yang bakhil (daripada berbuat kebajikan) dan merasa cukup dengan kekayaan dan kemewahannya, -
saheeh: But as for he who withholds and considers himself free of need
yusufali: But he who is a greedy miser and thinks himself self-sufficient,

malay: Serta ia mendustakan perkara yang baik,
saheeh: And denies the best [reward],
yusufali: And gives the lie to the best,-

malay: Maka sesungguhnya Kami akan memberikannya kemudahan untuk mendapat kesusahan dan kesengsaraan;
saheeh: We will ease him toward difficulty.
yusufali: We will indeed make smooth for him the path to Misery;

malay: Dan apakah pertolongan yang dapat diberi kepadanya oleh hartanya apabila ia telah terjerumus (ke dalam azab seksa hari akhirat)?
saheeh: And what will his wealth avail him when he falls?
yusufali: Nor will his wealth profit him when he falls headlong (into the Pit).

malay: Sesungguhnya tanggungan Kamilah memberi hidayah petunjuk (tentang yang benar dan yang salah).
saheeh: Indeed, [incumbent] upon Us is guidance.
yusufali: Verily We take upon Ourselves to guide,

malay: Dan sesungguhnya Kamilah yang menguasai hari akhirat dan alam dunia.
saheeh: And indeed, to Us belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].
yusufali: And verily unto Us (belong) the End and the Beginning.

malay: Maka (serentak dengan memberi hidayah petunjuk) Aku juga telah memberi amaran mengingatkan kamu akan api neraka yang marak menjulang,
saheeh: So I have warned you of a Fire which is blazing.
yusufali: Therefore do I warn you of a Fire blazing fiercely;

malay: Yang tidak akan menderita bakarannya melainkan orang yang sungguh celaka, -
saheeh: None will [enter to] burn therein except the most wretched one.
yusufali: None shall reach it but those most unfortunate ones

malay: Yang telah mendustakan (kebenaran) dan berpaling ingkar.
saheeh: Who had denied and turned away.
yusufali: Who give the lie to Truth and turn their backs.

malay: Dan (sebaliknya) akan dijauhkan (azab neraka) itu daripada orang yang sungguh bertaqwa, -
saheeh: But the righteous one will avoid it -
yusufali: But those most devoted to Allah shall be removed far from it,-

malay: Yang mendermakan hartanya dengan tujuan membersihkan dirinya dan hartabendanya,
saheeh: [He] who gives [from] his wealth to purify himself
yusufali: Those who spend their wealth for increase in self-purification,

malay: Sedang ia tidak menanggung budi sesiapapun, yang patut di balas,
saheeh: And not [giving] for anyone who has [done him] a favor to be rewarded
yusufali: And have in their minds no favour from anyone for which a reward is expected in return,

malay: Hanyalah mengharapkan keredaan Tuhannya Yang Maha Tinggi;
saheeh: But only seeking the countenance of his Lord, Most High.
yusufali: But only the desire to seek for the Countenance of their Lord Most High;

malay: Dan demi sesungguhnya, ia tetap akan berpuas hati (pada hari akhirat, dengan mendapat segala yang diharapkannya).
saheeh: And he is going to be satisfied.
yusufali: And soon will they attain (complete) satisfaction.

malay: Demi waktu dhuha,
saheeh: By the morning brightness
yusufali: By the Glorious Morning Light,

malay: Dan malam apabila ia sunyi-sepi -
saheeh: And [by] the night when it covers with darkness,
yusufali: And by the Night when it is still,-

malay: (Bahawa) Tuhanmu (wahai Muhammad) tidak meninggalkanmu, dan Ia tidak benci (kepadamu, sebagaimana yang dituduh oleh kaum musyrik).
saheeh: Your Lord has not taken leave of you, [O Muhammad], nor has He detested [you].
yusufali: Thy Guardian-Lord hath not forsaken thee, nor is He displeased.

malay: Dan sesungguhnya kesudahan keaadaanmu adalah lebih baik bagimu daripada permulaannya.
saheeh: And the Hereafter is better for you than the first [life].
yusufali: And verily the Hereafter will be better for thee than the present.

malay: Dan sesungguhnya Tuhanmu akan memberikanmu (kejayaan dan kebahagiaan di dunia dan di akhirat) sehingga engkau reda - berpuas hati.
saheeh: And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.
yusufali: And soon will thy Guardian-Lord give thee (that wherewith) thou shalt be well-pleased.

malay: Bukankah dia mendapati engkau yatim piatu, lalu la memberikan perlindungan?
saheeh: Did He not find you an orphan and give [you] refuge?
yusufali: Did He not find thee an orphan and give thee shelter (and care)?

malay: Dan didapatiNya engkau mencari-cari (jalan yang benar), lalu Ia memberikan hidayah petunjuk (dengan wahyu - Al-Quran)?
saheeh: And He found you lost and guided [you],
yusufali: And He found thee wandering, and He gave thee guidance.

malay: Dan didapatiNya engkau miskin, lalu Ia memberikan kekayaan?
saheeh: And He found you poor and made [you] self-sufficient.
yusufali: And He found thee in need, and made thee independent.

malay: Oleh itu, adapun anak yatim maka janganlah engkau berlaku kasar terhadapnya,
saheeh: So as for the orphan, do not oppress [him].
yusufali: Therefore, treat not the orphan with harshness,

malay: Adapun orang yang meminta (bantuan pimpinan) maka janganlah engkau tengking herdik;
saheeh: And as for the petitioner, do not repel [him].
yusufali: Nor repulse the petitioner (unheard);

malay: Adapun nikmat Tuhanmu, maka hendaklah engkau sebut-sebutkan (dan zahirkan) sebagai bersyukur kepadaNya.
saheeh: But as for the favor of your Lord, report [it].
yusufali: But the bounty of the Lord - rehearse and proclaim!

malay: Bukankah Kami telah melapangkan bagimu: dadamu (wahai Muhammad serta mengisinya dengan iman dan hidayah petunjuk) ?
saheeh: Did We not expand for you, [O Muhammad], your breast?
yusufali: Have We not expanded thee thy breast?-

malay: Dan Kami telah meringankan daripadamu: bebanmu (menyiarkan Islam) -
saheeh: And We removed from you your burden
yusufali: And removed from thee thy burden

malay: Yang memberati tanggunganmu, (dengan memberikan berbagai kemudahan dalam melaksanakannya)?
saheeh: Which had weighed upon your back
yusufali: The which did gall thy back?-

malay: Dan Kami telah meninggikan bagimu: sebutan namamu (dengan mengurniakan pangkat Nabi dan berbagai kemuliaan)?
saheeh: And raised high for you your repute.
yusufali: And raised high the esteem (in which) thou (art held)?

malay: Oleh itu, maka (tetapkanlah kepercayaanmu) bahawa sesungguhnya tiap-tiap kesukaran disertai kemudahan,
saheeh: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.
yusufali: So, verily, with every difficulty, there is relief:

malay: (Sekali lagi ditegaskan): bahawa sesungguhnya tiap-tiap kesukaran disertai kemudahan.
saheeh: Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.
yusufali: Verily, with every difficulty there is relief.

malay: Kemudian apabila engkau telah selesai (daripada sesuatu amal soleh), maka bersungguh-sungguhlah engkau berusaha (mengerjakan amal soleh yang lain),
saheeh: So when you have finished [your duties], then stand up [for worship].
yusufali: Therefore, when thou art free (from thine immediate task), still labour hard,

malay: Dan kepada Tuhanmu sahaja hendaklah engkau memohon (apa yang engkau gemar dan ingini).
saheeh: And to your Lord direct [your] longing.
yusufali: And to thy Lord turn (all) thy attention.

malay: Demi buah Tiin dan Zaitun,
saheeh: By the fig and the olive
yusufali: By the Fig and the Olive,

malay: Dan Gunung Tursina,
saheeh: And [by] Mount Sinai
yusufali: And the Mount of Sinai,

malay: Serta negeri (Makkah) yang aman ini, -
saheeh: And [by] this secure city [Makkah],
yusufali: And this City of security,-

malay: Sesungguhnya Kami telah menciptakan manusia dalam bentuk yang sebaik-baiknya (dan berkelengkapan sesuai dengan keadaannya).
saheeh: We have certainly created man in the best of stature;
yusufali: We have indeed created man in the best of moulds,

malay: Kemudian (jika ia panjang umur sehingga tua atau menyalahgunakan kelengkapan itu), Kami kembalikan dia ke serendah-rendah peringkat orang-orang yang rendah,
saheeh: Then We return him to the lowest of the low,
yusufali: Then do We abase him (to be) the lowest of the low,-

malay: Kecuali orang-orang yang beriman dan beramal soleh, maka mereka beroleh pahala yang tidak putus-putus.
saheeh: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds, for they will have a reward uninterrupted.
yusufali: Except such as believe and do righteous deeds: For they shall have a reward unfailing.

malay: (Jika demikian kekuasaanKu), maka apa pula yang menjadikan engkau seorang pendusta, (berkata tidak benar) mengenai hari pembalasan, sesudah (ternyata dalil-dalil yang membuktikan kekuasaanKu mengadakan hari pembalasan) itu?
saheeh: So what yet causes you to deny the Recompense?
yusufali: Then what can, after this, contradict thee, as to the judgment (to come)?

malay: Bukankah Allah (yang demikian kekuasaanNya) seadil-adil Hakim?
saheeh: Is not Allah the most just of judges?
yusufali: Is not Allah the wisest of judges?

malay: Bacalah (wahai Muhammad) dengan nama Tuhanmu yang menciptakan (sekalian makhluk),
saheeh: Recite in the name of your Lord who created -
yusufali: Proclaim! (or read!) in the name of thy Lord and Cherisher, Who created-

malay: Ia menciptakan manusia dari sebuku darah beku;
saheeh: Created man from a clinging substance.
yusufali: Created man, out of a (mere) clot of congealed blood:

malay: Bacalah, dan Tuhanmu Yang Maha Pemurah, -
saheeh: Recite, and your Lord is the most Generous -
yusufali: Proclaim! And thy Lord is Most Bountiful,-

malay: Yang mengajar manusia melalui pena dan tulisan, -
saheeh: Who taught by the pen -
yusufali: He Who taught (the use of) the pen,-

malay: Ia mengajarkan manusia apa yang tidak diketahuinya.
saheeh: Taught man that which he knew not.
yusufali: Taught man that which he knew not.

malay: Ingatlah! Sesungguhnya jenis manusia tetap melampaui batas (yang sepatutnya atau yang sewajibnya),
saheeh: No! [But] indeed, man transgresses
yusufali: Nay, but man doth transgress all bounds,

malay: Dengan sebab ia melihat dirinya sudah cukup apa yang dihajatinya.
saheeh: Because he sees himself self-sufficient.
yusufali: In that he looketh upon himself as self-sufficient.

malay: (Ingatlah) sesungguhnya kepada Tuhanmu lah tempat kembali (untuk menerima balasan).
saheeh: Indeed, to your Lord is the return.
yusufali: Verily, to thy Lord is the return (of all).

malay: Adakah engkau nampak (baiknya) orang yang melarang (dan menghalang) -
saheeh: Have you seen the one who forbids
yusufali: Seest thou one who forbids-

malay: Seorang hamba Allah apabila ia mengerjakan sembahyang?
saheeh: A servant when he prays?
yusufali: A votary when he (turns) to pray?

malay: Adakah engkau nampak (buruknya) jika ia berada di atas jalan yang betul? -
saheeh: Have you seen if he is upon guidance
yusufali: Seest thou if he is on (the road of) Guidance?-

malay: Atau ia menyuruh orang bertaqwa (jangan melakukan syirik)?
saheeh: Or enjoins righteousness?
yusufali: Or enjoins Righteousness?

malay: Adakah engkau nampak (terlepasnya dari azab) jika ia mendustakan (apa yang disampaikan oleh Nabi Muhammad kepadanya) serta ia berpaling ingkar?
saheeh: Have you seen if he denies and turns away -
yusufali: Seest thou if he denies (Truth) and turns away?

malay: Tidakkah ia mengetahui bahawa sesungguhnya Allah melihat (segala amal perbuatannya dan membalasnya)?
saheeh: Does he not know that Allah sees?
yusufali: Knoweth he not that Allah doth see?

malay: Jangan sekali-kali berlaku derhaka! Demi sesungguhnya jika ia tidak berhenti (dari perbuatannya yang buruk itu), nescaya Kami akan menyentap ubun-ubunnya (dan menyeretnya ke dalam neraka), -
saheeh: No! If he does not desist, We will surely drag him by the forelock -
yusufali: Let him beware! If he desist not, We will drag him by the forelock,-

malay: Ubun-ubun (orang) yang berdusta, yang bersalah.
saheeh: A lying, sinning forelock.
yusufali: A lying, sinful forelock!

malay: Kemudian biarlah ia memanggil kumpulannya (untuk menyelamatkannya),
saheeh: Then let him call his associates;
yusufali: Then, let him call (for help) to his council (of comrades):

malay: Kami pula akan memanggil malaikat Zabaniyah (untuk menyeksanya)!
saheeh: We will call the angels of Hell.
yusufali: We will call on the angels of punishment (to deal with him)!

malay: Ingatlah! Janganlah engkau (wahai Muhammad) menurut kehendaknya, dan (sebaliknya) sujudlah dan dampingkanlah dirimu kepada Allah (dengan taat dan beramal soleh)!
saheeh: No! Do not obey him. But prostrate and draw near [to Allah].
yusufali: Nay, heed him not: But bow down in adoration, and bring thyself the closer (to Allah)!

malay: Sesungguhnya Kami telah menurunkan (Al-Quran) ini pada Malam Lailatul-Qadar,
saheeh: Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree.
yusufali: We have indeed revealed this (Message) in the Night of Power:

malay: Dan apa jalannya engkau dapat mengetahui apa dia kebesaran Malam Lailatul-Qadar itu?
saheeh: And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?
yusufali: And what will explain to thee what the night of power is?

malay: Malam Lailatul-Qadar lebih baik daripada seribu bulan.
saheeh: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.
yusufali: The Night of Power is better than a thousand months.

malay: Pada Malam itu, turun malaikat dan Jibril dengan izin Tuhan mereka, kerana membawa segala perkara (yang ditakdirkan berlakunya pada tahun yang berikut);
saheeh: The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter.
yusufali: Therein come down the angels and the Spirit by Allah's permission, on every errand:

malay: Sejahteralah Malam (yang berkat) itu hingga terbit fajar!
saheeh: Peace it is until the emergence of dawn.
yusufali: Peace!... This until the rise of morn!

malay: Orang-orang yang kafir dari Ahli Kitab (Yahudi dan Nasrani) serta orang-orang musyrik, tidak akan terlepas (dari kepercayaan dan amalan masing-masing) sehingga datang kepada mereka bukti yang jelas nyata, -
saheeh: Those who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists were not to be parted [from misbelief] until there came to them clear evidence -
yusufali: Those who reject (Truth), among the People of the Book and among the Polytheists, were not going to depart (from their ways) until there should come to them Clear Evidence,-

malay: Iaitu seorang Rasul dari Allah yang membacakan (kepada mereka) Lembaran-lembaran Suci,
saheeh: A Messenger from Allah, reciting purified scriptures
