yusufali: An messenger from Allah, rehearsing scriptures kept pure and holy:

malay: Terkandung di dalamnya pelajaran-pelajaran dan hukum-hukum yang benar.
saheeh: Within which are correct writings.
yusufali: Wherein are laws (or decrees) right and straight.

malay: Dan orang-orang (Yahudi dan Nasrani) yang diberi Kitab (Taurat dan Injil) itu, tidak berpecah-belah melainkan setelah datang kepada mereka bukti yang jelas nyata.
saheeh: Nor did those who were given the Scripture become divided until after there had come to them clear evidence.
yusufali: Nor did the People of the Book make schisms, until after there came to them Clear Evidence.

malay: Pada hal mereka tidak diperintahkan melainkan supaya menyembah Allah dengan mengikhlaskan ibadat kepadaNya, lagi tetap teguh di atas tauhid; dan supaya mereka mendirikan sembahyang serta memberi zakat. Dan yang demikian itulah Agama yang benar.
saheeh: And they were not commanded except to worship Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion, inclining to truth, and to establish prayer and to give zakah. And that is the correct religion.
yusufali: And they have been commanded no more than this: To worship Allah, offering Him sincere devotion, being true (in faith); to establish regular prayer; and to practise regular charity; and that is the Religion Right and Straight.

malay: Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang kafir dari Ahli Kitab dan orang-orang musyrik itu akan ditempatkan di dalam neraka Jahannam, kekallah mereka di dalamnya. Mereka itulah sejahat-jahat makhluk.
saheeh: Indeed, they who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists will be in the fire of Hell, abiding eternally therein. Those are the worst of creatures.
yusufali: Those who reject (Truth), among the People of the Book and among the Polytheists, will be in Hell-Fire, to dwell therein (for aye). They are the worst of creatures.

malay: Seungguhnya orang-orang yang beriman dan beramal soleh, mereka itulah sebaik-baik makhluk.
saheeh: Indeed, they who have believed and done righteous deeds - those are the best of creatures.
yusufali: Those who have faith and do righteous deeds,- they are the best of creatures.

malay: Balasan mereka di sisi Tuhannya ialah syurga Adn (tempat tinggal yang tetap), yang mengalir di bawahnya beberapa sungai; kekallah mereka di dalamnya selama-lamanya; Allah reda akan mereka dan merekapun reda (serta bersyukur) akan nikmat pemberianNya. Balasan yang demikian itu untuk orang-orang yang takut (melanggar perintah) Tuhannya.
saheeh: Their reward with Allah will be gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever, Allah being pleased with them and they with Him. That is for whoever has feared his Lord.
yusufali: Their reward is with Allah: Gardens of Eternity, beneath which rivers flow; they will dwell therein for ever; Allah well pleased with them, and they with Him: all this for such as fear their Lord and Cherisher.

malay: Apabila bumi digegarkan dengan gegaran yang sedahsyat-dahsyatnya,
saheeh: When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake
yusufali: When the earth is shaken to her (utmost) convulsion,

malay: Serta bumi itu mengeluarkan segala isinya,
saheeh: And the earth discharges its burdens
yusufali: And the earth throws up her burdens (from within),

malay: Dan berkatalah manusia (dengan perasaan gerun); "Apa yang sudah terjadi kepada bumi?"
saheeh: And man says, "What is [wrong] with it?" -
yusufali: And man cries (distressed): 'What is the matter with her?'-

malay: Pada hari itu bumipun menceritakan khabar beritanya:
saheeh: That Day, it will report its news
yusufali: On that Day will she declare her tidings:

malay: Bahawa Tuhanmu telah memerintahnya (berlaku demikian).
saheeh: Because your Lord has commanded it.
yusufali: For that thy Lord will have given her inspiration.

malay: Pada hari itu manusia akan keluar berselerak (dari kubur masing-masing) - untuk diperlihatkan kepada mereka (balasan) amal-amal mereka.
saheeh: That Day, the people will depart separated [into categories] to be shown [the result of] their deeds.
yusufali: On that Day will men proceed in companies sorted out, to be shown the deeds that they (had done).

malay: Maka sesiapa berbuat kebajikan seberat zarah, nescaya akan dilihatnya (dalam surat amalnya)!
saheeh: So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it,
yusufali: Then shall anyone who has done an atom's weight of good, see it!

malay: Dan sesiapa berbuat kejahatan seberat zarah, nescaya akan dilihatnya (dalam surat amalnya)!
saheeh: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.
yusufali: And anyone who has done an atom's weight of evil, shall see it.

malay: Demi Kuda Perang yang tangkas berlari dengan kedengaran kencang nafasnya,
saheeh: By the racers, panting,
yusufali: By the (Steeds) that run, with panting (breath),

malay: Serta mencetuskan api dari telapak kakinya,
saheeh: And the producers of sparks [when] striking
yusufali: And strike sparks of fire,

malay: Dan meluru menyerbu musuh pada waktu subuh,
saheeh: And the chargers at dawn,
yusufali: And push home the charge in the morning,

malay: Sehingga menghamburkan debu pada waktu itu,
saheeh: Stirring up thereby [clouds of] dust,
yusufali: And raise the dust in clouds the while,

malay: Lalu menggempur ketika itu di tengah-tengah kumpulan musuh;
saheeh: Arriving thereby in the center collectively,
yusufali: And penetrate forthwith into the midst (of the foe) en masse;-

malay: Sesungguhnya manusia sangat tidak bersyukur akan nikmat Tuhannya.
saheeh: Indeed mankind, to his Lord, is ungrateful.
yusufali: Truly man is, to his Lord, ungrateful;

malay: Dan sesungguhnya ia (dengan bawaannya) menerangkan dengan jelas keadaan yang demikian;
saheeh: And indeed, he is to that a witness.
yusufali: And to that (fact) he bears witness (by his deeds);

malay: Dan sesungguhnya ia melampau sangat sayangkan harta (secara tamak haloba).
saheeh: And indeed he is, in love of wealth, intense.
yusufali: And violent is he in his love of wealth.

malay: (Patutkah ia bersikap demikian?) Tidakkah ia mengetahui (bagaimana keadaan) ketika dibongkarkan segala yang ada dalam kubur?
saheeh: But does he not know that when the contents of the graves are scattered
yusufali: Does he not know,- when that which is in the graves is scattered abroad

malay: Dan dikumpul serta didedahkan segala yang terpendam dalam dada?
saheeh: And that within the breasts is obtained,
yusufali: And that which is (locked up) in (human) breasts is made manifest-

malay: Sesungguhnya Tuhan mereka Maha Mengetahui dengan mendalam tentang (balasan yang diberikanNya kepada) mereka - pada hari itu.
saheeh: Indeed, their Lord with them, that Day, is [fully] Acquainted.
yusufali: That their Lord had been Well-acquainted with them, (even to) that Day?

malay: Hari yang menggemparkan,
saheeh: The Striking Calamity -
yusufali: The (Day) of Noise and Clamour:

malay: Apa dia hari yang menggemparkan itu?
saheeh: What is the Striking Calamity?
yusufali: What is the (Day) of Noise and Clamour?

malay: Dan apa jalannya engkau dapat mengetahui kedahsyatan hari yang menggemparkan itu? -
saheeh: And what can make you know what is the Striking Calamity?
yusufali: And what will explain to thee what the (Day) of Noise and Clamour is?

malay: (Hari itu ialah: hari kiamat), hari manusia menjadi seperti kelkatu yang terbang berkeliaran,
saheeh: It is the Day when people will be like moths, dispersed,
yusufali: (It is) a Day whereon men will be like moths scattered about,

malay: Dan gunung-ganang menjadi seperti bulu yang dibusar berterbangan.
saheeh: And the mountains will be like wool, fluffed up.
yusufali: And the mountains will be like carded wool.

malay: Setelah berlaku demikian, maka (manusia akan diberikan tempatnya menurut amal masing-masing); adapun orang yang berat timbangan amal baiknya, -
saheeh: Then as for one whose scales are heavy [with good deeds],
yusufali: Then, he whose balance (of good deeds) will be (found) heavy,

malay: Maka ia berada dalam kehidupan yang senang lenang.
saheeh: He will be in a pleasant life.
yusufali: Will be in a life of good pleasure and satisfaction.

malay: Sebaliknya orang yang ringan timbangan amal baiknya, -
saheeh: But as for one whose scales are light,
yusufali: But he whose balance (of good deeds) will be (found) light,-

malay: Maka tempat kembalinya ialah "Haawiyah"
saheeh: His refuge will be an abyss.
yusufali: Will have his home in a (bottomless) Pit.

malay: Dan apa jalannya engkau dapat mengetahui, apa dia "Haawiyah" itu?
saheeh: And what can make you know what that is?
yusufali: And what will explain to thee what this is?

malay: (Haawiyah itu ialah): api yang panas membakar.
saheeh: It is a Fire, intensely hot.
yusufali: (It is) a Fire Blazing fiercely!

malay: Kamu telah dilalaikan (daripada mengerjakan amal bakti) oleh perbuatan berlumba-lumba untuk mendapat dengan sebanyak-banyaknya (harta benda, anak-pinak pangkat dan pengaruh), -
saheeh: Competition in [worldly] increase diverts you
yusufali: The mutual rivalry for piling up (the good things of this world) diverts you (from the more serious things),

malay: Sehingga kamu masuk kubur.
saheeh: Until you visit the graveyards.
yusufali: Until ye visit the graves.

malay: Jangan sekali-kali (bersikap demikian)! Kamu akan mengetahui kelak (akibatnya yang buruk semasa hendak mati)!
saheeh: No! You are going to know.
yusufali: But nay, ye soon shall know (the reality).

malay: Sekali lagi (diingatkan): jangan sekali-kali (kamu bersikap demikian)! Kamu akan mengetahui kelak (akibatnya yang buruk pada hari kiamat)!
saheeh: Then no! You are going to know.
yusufali: Again, ye soon shall know!

malay: Demi sesungguhnya! Kalaulah kamu mengetahui - (apa yang kamu akan hadapi) - dengan pengetahuan yang yakin, (tentulah kamu akan mengerjakan perkara-perkara yang menjadi bekalan kamu untuk hari akhirat).
saheeh: No! If you only knew with knowledge of certainty...
yusufali: Nay, were ye to know with certainty of mind, (ye would beware!)

malay: (Ingatlah) demi sesungguhnya! - Kamu akan melihat neraka yang marak menjulang.
saheeh: You will surely see the Hellfire.
yusufali: Ye shall certainly see Hell-Fire!

malay: Selepas itu - demi sesungguhnya! - kamu (wahai orang-orang yang derhaka) akan melihatnya dengan penglihatan yang yakin (semasa kamu dilemparkan ke dalamnya)!
saheeh: Then you will surely see it with the eye of certainty.
yusufali: Again, ye shall see it with certainty of sight!

malay: Selain dari itu, sesungguhnya kamu akan ditanya pada hari itu, tentang segala nikmat (yang kamu telah menikmatinya)!
saheeh: Then you will surely be asked that Day about pleasure.
yusufali: Then, shall ye be questioned that Day about the joy (ye indulged in!).

malay: Demi Masa!
saheeh: By time,
yusufali: By (the Token of) Time (through the ages),

malay: Sesungguhnya manusia itu dalam kerugian -
saheeh: Indeed, mankind is in loss,
yusufali: Verily Man is in loss,

malay: Kecuali orang-orang yang beriman dan beramal soleh, dan mereka pula berpesan-pesan dengan kebenaran serta berpesan-pesan dengan sabar.
saheeh: Except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience.
yusufali: Except such as have Faith, and do righteous deeds, and (join together) in the mutual teaching of Truth, and of Patience and Constancy.

malay: Kecelakaan besar bagi tiap-tiap pencaci, pengeji,
saheeh: Woe to every scorner and mocker
yusufali: Woe to every (kind of) scandal-monger and-backbiter,

malay: Yang mengumpulkan harta dan berulang-ulang menghitung kekayaannya;
saheeh: Who collects wealth and [continuously] counts it.
yusufali: Who pileth up wealth and layeth it by,

malay: Ia menyangka bahawa hartanya itu dapat mengekalkannya (dalam dunia ini)!
saheeh: He thinks that his wealth will make him immortal.
yusufali: Thinking that his wealth would make him last for ever!

malay: Tidak! Sesungguhnya dia akan dicampakkan ke dalam "Al-Hutamah".
saheeh: No! He will surely be thrown into the Crusher.
yusufali: By no means! He will be sure to be thrown into That which Breaks to Pieces,

malay: Dan apa jalannya engkau dapat mengetahui, apa dia "Al-Hutamah" itu?
saheeh: And what can make you know what is the Crusher?
yusufali: And what will explain to thee That which Breaks to Pieces?

malay: (Al-Hutamah) ialah api Allah yang dinyalakan (dengan perintahNya), -
saheeh: It is the fire of Allah, [eternally] fueled,
yusufali: (It is) the Fire of (the Wrath of) Allah kindled (to a blaze),

malay: Yang naik menjulang ke hati;
saheeh: Which mounts directed at the hearts.
yusufali: The which doth mount (Right) to the Hearts:

malay: Sesungguhnnya api neraka itu ditutup rapat atas mereka.
saheeh: Indeed, Hellfire will be closed down upon them
yusufali: It shall be made into a vault over them,

malay: (Mereka terikat di situ) pada batang-batang palang yang melintang panjang.
saheeh: In extended columns.
yusufali: In columns outstretched.

malay: Tidakkah engkau mengetahui bagaimana Tuhanmu telah melakukan kepada angkatan tentera (yang dipimpin oleh pembawa) Gajah, (yang hendak meruntuhkan Kaabah)?
saheeh: Have you not considered, [O Muhammad], how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant?
yusufali: Seest thou not how thy Lord dealt with the Companions of the Elephant?

malay: Bukankah Tuhanmu telah menjadikan rancangan jahat mereka dalam keadaan yang rugi dan memusnahkan mereka?
saheeh: Did He not make their plan into misguidance?
yusufali: Did He not make their treacherous plan go astray?

malay: Dan Ia telah menghantarkan kepada mereka (rombongan) burung berpasuk-pasukan, -
saheeh: And He sent against them birds in flocks,
yusufali: And He sent against them Flights of Birds,

malay: Yang melontar mereka dengan batu-batu dari sejenis tanah yang dibakar keras, -
saheeh: Striking them with stones of hard clay,
yusufali: Striking them with stones of baked clay.

malay: Lalu Ia menjadikan mereka hancur berkecai seperti daun-daun kayu yang dimakan ulat.
saheeh: And He made them like eaten straw.
yusufali: Then did He make them like an empty field of stalks and straw, (of which the corn) has been eaten up.

malay: Kerana kebiasaan aman tenteram kaum Quraisy (penduduk Makkah)
saheeh: For the accustomed security of the Quraysh -
yusufali: For the covenants (of security and safeguard enjoyed) by the Quraish,

malay: (laitu) kebiasaan aman tenteram perjalanan mereka (menjalankan perniagaan) pada musim sejuk (ke negeri Yaman), dan pada musim panas (ke negeri Syam),
saheeh: Their accustomed security [in] the caravan of winter and summer -
yusufali: Their covenants (covering) journeys by winter and summer,-

malay: Maka hendaklah mereka menyembah Tuhan yang menguasai rumah (Kaabah) ini,
saheeh: Let them worship the Lord of this House,
yusufali: Let them adore the Lord of this House,

malay: Tuhan yang memberi mereka penghidupan: menyelamatkan mereka dari kelaparan, dan mengamankan mereka dari ketakutan.
saheeh: Who has fed them, [saving them] from hunger and made them safe, [saving them] from fear.
yusufali: Who provides them with food against hunger, and with security against fear (of danger).

malay: Tahukah engkau akan orang yang mendustakan agama (meliputi hari pembalasan)?
saheeh: Have you seen the one who denies the Recompense?
yusufali: Seest thou one who denies the Judgment (to come)?

malay: Orang itu ialah yang menindas serta berlaku zalim kepada anak yatim,
saheeh: For that is the one who drives away the orphan
yusufali: Then such is the (man) who repulses the orphan (with harshness),

malay: Dan ia tidak menggalakkan untuk memberi makanan yang berhak diterima oleh orang miskin.
saheeh: And does not encourage the feeding of the poor.
yusufali: And encourages not the feeding of the indigent.

malay: (Kalau orang yang demikian dikira dari bilangan orang-orang yang mendustakan agama), maka kecelakaan besar bagi orang-orang Ahli Sembahyang -
saheeh: So woe to those who pray
yusufali: So woe to the worshippers

malay: (laitu) mereka yang berkeadaan lalai daripada menyempurnakan sembahyangnya;
saheeh: [But] who are heedless of their prayer -
yusufali: Who are neglectful of their prayers,

malay: (Juga bagi) orang-orang yang berkeadaan riak (bangga diri dalam ibadat dan bawaannya),
saheeh: Those who make show [of their deeds]
yusufali: Those who (want but) to be seen (of men),

malay: Dan orang-orang yang tidak memberi sedikit pertolongan (kepada orang yang berhak mendapatnya).
saheeh: And withhold [simple] assistance.
yusufali: But refuse (to supply) (even) neighbourly needs.

malay: Sesungguhnya Kami telah mengurniakan kepadamu (wahai Muhammad) kebaikan yang banyak (di dunia dan di akhirat).
saheeh: Indeed, We have granted you, [O Muhammad], al-Kawthar.
yusufali: To thee have We granted the Fount (of Abundance).

malay: Oleh itu, kerjakanlah sembahyang kerana Tuhanmu semata-mata, dan sembelihlah korban (sebagai bersyukur).
saheeh: So pray to your Lord and sacrifice [to Him alone].
yusufali: Therefore to thy Lord turn in Prayer and Sacrifice.

malay: Sesungguhnya orang yang bencikan engkau, Dia lah yang terputus (dari mendapat sebarang perkara yang diingininya).
saheeh: Indeed, your enemy is the one cut off.
yusufali: For he who hateth thee, he will be cut off (from Future Hope).

malay: Katakanlah (wahai Muhammad): "Hai orang-orang kafir!
saheeh: Say, "O disbelievers,
yusufali: Say: O ye that reject Faith!

malay: "Aku tidak akan menyembah apa yang kamu sembah.
saheeh: I do not worship what you worship.
yusufali: I worship not that which ye worship,

malay: "Dan kamu tidak mahu menyembah (Allah) yang aku sembah.
saheeh: Nor are you worshippers of what I worship.
yusufali: Nor will ye worship that which I worship.

malay: "Dan aku tidak akan beribadat secara kamu beribadat.
saheeh: Nor will I be a worshipper of what you worship.
yusufali: And I will not worship that which ye have been wont to worship,

malay: "Dan kamu pula tidak mahu beribadat secara aku beribadat.
saheeh: Nor will you be worshippers of what I worship.
yusufali: Nor will ye worship that which I worship.

malay: "Bagi kamu agama kamu, dan bagiku agamaku".
saheeh: For you is your religion, and for me is my religion."
yusufali: To you be your Way, and to me mine.

malay: Apabila datang pertolongan Allah dan kemenangan (semasa engkau wahai Muhammad berjaya menguasai negeri Makkah), -
saheeh: When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest,
yusufali: When comes the Help of Allah, and Victory,

malay: Dan engkau melihat manusia masuk dalam agama Allah beramai-ramai, -
saheeh: And you see the people entering into the religion of Allah in multitudes,
yusufali: And thou dost see the people enter Allah's Religion in crowds,

malay: Maka ucapkanlah tasbih dengan memuji Tuhanmu dan mintalah ampun kepadaNya, sesungguhnya Dia amat menerima taubat.
saheeh: Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance.
yusufali: Celebrate the praises of thy Lord, and pray for His Forgiveness: For He is Oft-Returning (in Grace and Mercy).

malay: Binasalah kedua-dua tangan Abu lahab, dan binasalah ia bersama!
saheeh: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he.
yusufali: Perish the hands of the Father of Flame! Perish he!

malay: Hartanya dan segala yang diusahakannya, tidak dapat menolongnya.
saheeh: His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained.
yusufali: No profit to him from all his wealth, and all his gains!

malay: Ia akan menderita bakaran api neraka yang marak menjulang.
saheeh: He will [enter to] burn in a Fire of [blazing] flame
yusufali: Burnt soon will he be in a Fire of Blazing Flame!

malay: Dan juga isterinya, seorang perempuan pemunggah kayu api. -
saheeh: And his wife [as well] - the carrier of firewood.
yusufali: His wife shall carry the (crackling) wood - As fuel!-

malay: Di lehernya sejenis tali, dari tali-tali yang dipintal.
saheeh: Around her neck is a rope of [twisted] fiber.
yusufali: A twisted rope of palm-leaf fibre round her (own) neck!

malay: Katakanlah (wahai Muhammad): "(Tuhanku) ialah Allah Yang Maha Esa;
saheeh: Say, "He is Allah, [who is] One,
yusufali: Say: He is Allah, the One and Only;

malay: "Allah Yang menjadi tumpuan sekalian makhluk untuk memohon sebarang hajat;
saheeh: Allah, the Eternal Refuge.
yusufali: Allah, the Eternal, Absolute;

malay: "Ia tiada beranak, dan Ia pula tidak diperanakkan;
saheeh: He neither begets nor is born,
yusufali: He begetteth not, nor is He begotten;

malay: "Dan tidak ada sesiapapun yang serupa denganNya".
saheeh: Nor is there to Him any equivalent."
yusufali: And there is none like unto Him.

malay: Katakanlah (wahai Muhammad); "Aku berlindung kepada (Allah) Tuhan yang menciptakan sekalian makhluk,
saheeh: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak
yusufali: Say: I seek refuge with the Lord of the Dawn

malay: "Dari bencana makhluk-makhluk yang Ia ciptakan;
saheeh: From the evil of that which He created
yusufali: From the mischief of created things;

malay: "Dan dari bahaya gelap apabila ia masuk;
saheeh: And from the evil of darkness when it settles
yusufali: From the mischief of Darkness as it overspreads;

malay: "Dan dari kejahatan makhluk-makhluk yang menghembus-hembus pada simpulan-simpulan (dan ikatan-ikatan);
saheeh: And from the evil of the blowers in knots
yusufali: From the mischief of those who practise secret arts;

malay: "Dan dari kejahatan orang yang dengki apabila ia melakukan dengkinya".
saheeh: And from the evil of an envier when he envies."
yusufali: And from the mischief of the envious one as he practises envy.

malay: Katakanlah (wahai Muhammad): "Aku berlindung kepada (Allah) Pemulihara sekalian manusia.
saheeh: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind,
yusufali: Say: I seek refuge with the Lord and Cherisher of Mankind,

malay: "Yang Menguasai sekalian manusia,
saheeh: The Sovereign of mankind.
yusufali: The King (or Ruler) of Mankind,

malay: "Tuhan yang berhak disembah oleh sekalian manusia,
saheeh: The God of mankind,
yusufali: The god (or judge) of Mankind,-

malay: "Dari kejahatan pembisik penghasut yang timbul tenggelam, -
saheeh: From the evil of the retreating whisperer -
yusufali: From the mischief of the Whisperer (of Evil), who withdraws (after his whisper),-

malay: "Yang melemparkan bisikan dan hasutannya ke dalam hati manusia, -
saheeh: Who whispers [evil] into the breasts of mankind -
yusufali: (The same) who whispers into the hearts of Mankind,-

malay: "(Iaitu pembisik dan penghasut) dari kalangan jin dan manusia".
saheeh: From among the jinn and mankind."
yusufali: Among Jinns and among men.
